review.reviewText: Nice warm and homely place to stay with full peace and privacy at a good location

Gentleman at the counter though pleasant clearly did not know what he was doing.  After waiting for him to fumble through the first customer I then waited while he kept talking to customers on the phone while he was waiting on me.  Couldn't get the machines or printers to work.  Mattress was worn out and cockroach in bathroom.  Drain I tub was broken.  I will not stay here again especially as the price was almost $200 I expect more when paying that price.

review.title: Better than expected, close to airport
review.reviewText: Exceeded expectations.  Not top of the line but totally acceptable.

review.title: Convenient stay
review.reviewText: Needed a clean comfortable hotel close to airport for an early flight this did the job with a free airport transfer

review.title: Lack of blankets
review.reviewText:
The front desk did not know if there was an extra blanket available and, even if there was, would not bring it to the room. 
Really? Not 1 blanket in the whole hotel?
review.positiveRemarks: the price was the lowest even though it still was expensive.
review.negativeRemarks: more blankets and some service

review.title: Close to airport.
review.reviewText: The staff were very friendly and helpful. The hotel is close to the airport and close to lots of good restaurants just a block over. Room was clean and comfortable. The continental breakfast needs a little more to offer.
review.negativeRemarks: Muffins or bagels and jams for the breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: We were told about a good restaurant a block over and really enjoyed the Italian food there.

review.title: Nice hotel close to airport
review.reviewText: Nice.place to stay for a few nights. We got the train to San Francisco which is only a 20 min walk away. Was a.nice area if you don't mind a few planes taking off and landing overnight. Would stay here again if I was back.

review.title: Clean and convenient
review.reviewText: After staying at other more expensive hotels during a week long vacation in Bay area, we chose the Super 8 based on the location to SFO and the positive reviews. My family of 4 was very pleased with cleanliness, general layout (queen beds and bathroom sink outside of bathroom), and the staff's friendly attitudes.  Comp breakfast in AM was more than we expected - cereal, waffles, fruit, hard boiled eggs, etc. Coffee plentiful and hot.  You can tell ownership takes pride in this place. Not the fanciest or newest building, but safe, clean, and convenient. About 5-10 min to SFO.

review.title: Reasonably priced hotel close to airport
review.reviewText: We switched hotels from the comfort suites to the Super 8 because the price was so reasonable that we saved $70 each night. The hotel has a shuttle service to and from the airport. Our room was clean but oddly shaped. The breakfast wasn't so great but we were just happy with having saved $140 for 2 nights. Had pizza delivered both nights. A great hotel for the price.

review.title: Good hotel - value for money
review.reviewText: highly recommended for a stopover.  Great shuttle service to both domestic and international airports.  Good breakfast  Clean and spacious rooms.

review.title: Location is strategic
review.reviewText: This San Bruno location is about 30mins away to our planned destinations which are Mountain View, Palo Alto and downtown San Francisco. Worth it for its price with cleans rooms and friendly staff.
Awesome service not what I expected would stay there again.

review.title: Modern by 1970 standards but clean and adequate.
review.reviewText: Conveniently close to the airport. Waited 45 minutes for a shuttle pickup that never showed in the evening. Fortunately I was going to the motel and not in a hurry. Finally called Uber for a quick $8.75 ride. 5:30 AM shuttle from motel to airport was fine.

review.title: It's a nice hotel that closes to airport.
review.reviewText: The hotel staff who was in charge of breakfast was not nice.  When I was making waffle, the vale of waffle bottle dropped and messed up. the hotel staff was very unhappy. That's just accident and something wrong. Overall the hotel is clean.
review.positiveRemarks: The location and room is big and clean, that's what we like.
review.negativeRemarks: the hotel staff might be more professional.
review.locationRemarks: The location is really convenient to restaurant and airport.

review.title: Convenient and reasonably priced
review.reviewText: The check in process was extremely fast, and all of the staff that I talked with were very friendly and helpful. The hotel was easy to find, had plenty of parking, and was very clean.

review.title: Quiet, close to airport, free shuttle!
review.reviewText: We simply needed a hotel close to airport as we were stopping over for one day to meet family in San Fran.  Super 8 was quiet, very clean, neat, very nice staff, no charge for parking!!!, continental breakfast, ice machines, vending soda, plenty of places in the area that deliver (try Seniore's Pizza - outstanding), hotel residents can use computer in lobby, oh! and did I say quiet and very clean??  It's a little gem.  Yes, it is right on El Camino Way, but you are not bothered by traffic.  We got hotel shuttle to airport at 4:30am - excellent and no problem.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, very nice people working there, no parking fee, continental breakfast.  Noticed that they held luggage for a young couple! nice!
review.negativeRemarks: Maybe some curtains that closed all the way to keep out light - but this is NOT a BIG problem at all.
review.locationRemarks: We did not walk the area, but there are lots of restaurants close by that deliver, Walgreens, McD's. Fisherman's Wharf about an hour with traffic.

review.title: Free parking, free airport shuttle, and quiet room
review.reviewText: Free wifi, free airport shuttle, and free breakfast. Quiet air conditioner, perfect!
The rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable. Staff was very helpful and pleasant.

review.title: Handy for SFO
review.reviewText: Good priced hotel close to SFO. Very helpful front desk staff (Monica and Patricia especially). Good value compared to expensive nature of downtown San Francisco hotels. Only 20 minute walk to BART station for ride into city.
review.positiveRemarks: Overall good value for San Francisco - good standard budget hotel.
review.locationRemarks: Nice walk via 'downtown' San Bruno along the avenue to BART station.

review.title: Nice hotel by the airport if you need a night stay
review.reviewText: Hotel was easy to check in , right by airport , shuttle takes you to airport , and clean ! Be advised that planes are right near by !

review.title: Good for family.
review.reviewText: Convenient location to airport. Two king beds were great for family of four. Simple breakfast and airport shuttle also make travel with family less stressful.

review.title: Airport access was our need
review.reviewText: Pleasant facility in close proximity to SFO.  Breakfast hours were early enough, but space allotted was minimal.  Free shuttle to airport every half hour early morning, book it when you check in.  Ours was 10 min late for pickup, but we had allowed for that possibility.  Staff and rooms were perfect for our needs.  We would use them again.
review.negativeRemarks:
Space for more seating in breakfast area.
Make sure shuttle arrives on time to decrease anxiety of flyers.

review.title: Great for SFO
review.reviewText: Had a late check-in and early check-out, so really didn't do more that sleep and shower. Ground floor room was quiet, bed comfortable, and shuttle ran on-time. Really good option for layovers between flights.

review.title: Perfect for a budget hotel
review.reviewText: It was great and even better than its current 2 stat rating

review.title: convenient hotel
review.reviewText:
We found our room and bed very comfortable and close to airport, which is what we wanted.
The staff were congenial but a couple of complaints:  
1.  They failed to give us a wake-up call as requested.
2.  The desk should be more aware of time it takes for courtesy bus to get to airport as courtesy bus took over 1/2 hr to get to airport as we were first stop and then several other stops to pick up passengers.   This makes a difference for planning.  Fortunately we decided to take earlier courtesy bus just in case.

review.title: Close to airport.
review.reviewText: Only five minutes from rental car return. That's what we wanted with an early morning departure. Despite being on busy street, room was quiet. Plain vanilla room but clean. A bit of water leaking from toilet tank made for a wet spot on bathroom floor. Several restaurants nearby with a Chilis just a few blocks up the road.

review.title: Clean, comfortable, friendly
review.reviewText: Clean room. Comfortable bed. Staff was friendly. Close to the airport, which is convenient. Simple little continental breakfast was not great but good enough to start the day. The only negative is that we heard a couple airplanes take off or land around 1am. The hotel can't help that, but I thought that flying times were restricted. It's not a 5-star hotel, but for the price, it is great.

review.title: very convenient location at a great price
review.reviewText: we stayed here while visiting sites in san Francisco. off the beaten path but convenient to all areas airport downtown golden gate bridge
review.negativeRemarks: nothing
review.locationRemarks: airport was quick access and sites in sf

review.title: Close to the road  A bit noisy
review.reviewText: It was a great deal for an "economy" hotel.  I appreciated having the less expensive alternative on this particular journey.  The staff was great, friendly and helpful.  The room was clean and felt good.
review.locationRemarks: A few restaurants (local and chain) within walking distance.

review.title: Transit hotel
review.reviewText: Needed a place to crash due to flight transit.  Looked for hotels available near the airport, but prices were way up there.  This hotel seemed to be in reasonable price ranges when you had to spend 10 hour or so due to flight schedules.
review.positiveRemarks: Not too far away from airport.  Quick resoponse by hotel staff on request for shuttle pick up.
review.negativeRemarks: Rooms were a bit outdated and breakfast area was a bit small.
review.locationRemarks: Close to airport

review.title: Short and sweet
review.reviewText: Just in town for the night wanted a hotel that was close to the airport and not $259.00 a night.  I went for a walk when I got there and had dinner at the Mexican restaurant next door.  The staff was very friendly. The airport shuttle by the way only goes to the terminals.  I needed to be dropped of at a building on airport grounds and he wouldn't do it.  That was disappointing.

review.title: Close to airport and gas station
review.reviewText: I have nothing to add here. How much do I have to write in this section????????????
review.positiveRemarks:
Clean, well appointed room. 
Great complementary breakfast with very pleasant and helpful staff person on site.
review.negativeRemarks:
Need extra blanket(s). 
We turned on the AC because the room was stuffy. We got sinus congestion from whatever blew out of the AC unit

review.title: Cost -effective over-night near SFO
review.reviewText: Everything was great for what it is. Clean, Close to Airport. Helpful Staff
I was surprised by the number of amenities.  It really was nice.

review.title: very nice hotel close to the airport
review.reviewText: This was nice and close to the airport, which was what we wanted.    The room was very nice, much nicer than I expected.   Would stay here again. There were good restaurants close by and getting in and out of San Franscisco was easy from here.
review.positiveRemarks: The clean room.  The convenient location.
review.locationRemarks: We mainly came to see San Francisco and this was nice and close and also close to the airport.

review.title: Good value for the money
review.reviewText: Comfortable room. Free parking. Good location. Friendly staff.
review.positiveRemarks: Friendly and supportive staff. Good location on El Camino Real road and nearby airport. Free parking available.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast variety
review.locationRemarks: Good location. Many nearby restaurants. Close driving distance to shopping mall.

review.title: Close to Freeway, & a mall!
review.reviewText: The staff was very accommodating  & friendly! The hotel was clean & comfortable!

review.title: Very happy
review.reviewText: More Amenities than the Marriot downtown SF. Beds were not quite as comfy but close. Free parking. Close to airport, free airport shuttle.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: I loved this hotel, the staff was nice and friendly, the rooms were clean and they had microwave and fridge. The area looked safe. I will definitely be staying here again.

review.title: Nice hotel close to airport
review.reviewText: Staff was very friendly and helpful. Close to airport, clean , comfortable and affordable.

review.title: Good llocation to airport
review.reviewText: Worked well for us....". I dont wont write more
review.locationRemarks: Good location and stores close

review.title: Nice location to drive anywhere
review.reviewText: Nice King beds room. Just a bit of noisey because it faces the street. The breakfast is too simple.

review.title: Late Flight
review.reviewText: Arrived on a very late flight. Easy and fast check in. Room was nice. Breakfast has enough for the morning. Pleasant staff.

review.title: Clean hotel close to airport
review.reviewText: The place was spotless and comfortable. Staff was courteous, efficient and followed up on my requests.

review.title: Very good.
review.reviewText: better than expected.  Good hotel for transfer or short visiting
It was excellent.  Good location near the airport and restaurants close enough to to walk to.  It was also quiet even though my room had a window onto the Main Street, El,Camino.
review.positiveRemarks: In addition to a nicely decorated room it had lots of conveniently located utlets for plunging in electronic devices, phones, laptops, etc,

review.title: Nice and close to the airport
review.reviewText: Nice place, very friendly staff and very clean. Easy parking and breakfast included.
review.locationRemarks: Lots of places to eat within walking distance

review.title: Great hotel by the airport.
review.reviewText: The room was much nicer than I expected and was very clean. It had all of the amenities that I needed and the hotel is in a great location.

review.title: Quick access to SFO
review.reviewText: Inexpensive way to catch an early morning flight out of SFO

review.title: Would stay again
review.reviewText: Clean and recently updated.  Would stay again.  Has elevators as well.
It was clean,  comfortable and quiet with free parking and friendly employees

review.title: Great location for a short stay near SFO
review.reviewText: An older hotel, but very nicely and recently completely renovated.  All room furnishings are new, fixtures and  decor have been updated.  We were very pleasantly surprised.  I was expecting a barely adequate room, but instead, it was very nice.  King bed felt like it was brand new.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, great location, parking (free) in attached garage/lot.  Worked well for a short stop overnight at San Francisco airport.  Free airport shuttle!
review.locationRemarks: About a mile from SFO airport.  Lots of restaurants nearby, even a large shopping mall.  Neighborhood seems safe, low traffic.

review.reviewText: The hotel is a older Hotel however the staff keeps the facility in good shape and clean. It totally met my expectations and would not hesitate to stay there again.

review.title: Was pleasantly surprised
review.reviewText: The place was clean,  the people were friendly, and the location is convenient.  Airport shuttle was nice and the continental breakfast was nice as well.

review.title: Better than expected!!
review.reviewText: Rooms were small but comfortable. Good Mexican resteraunt next door. Make sure you call for shuttle at airport! We waited 1 hour until we figured it out.

review.title: Super Bowl
review.reviewText: A good place for a short stay. Very close to the airport and the have a shuttle in case you don't get a car.

review.title: Full value
review.reviewText: Excellent location.  Clean.  Professional staff.  Good transportation to and from airport.
The employee working in breakfast room blew her nose, held onto the Kleenex and was  replacing breakfast items and no hand washing or gloves woren.

review.title: Convenient, practical, would stay again
review.reviewText: This small motel is well-operated, convenient, clean. I made the reservation based on price, and would stay again for the ease and comfort
review.positiveRemarks: No froufrou, bells, whistles, fanciness, but easy checkin, efficient staff, clean room, independent heat and cooling, excellent shower, good breakfast
review.locationRemarks: 5 minutes to SFO with a regular shuttle, on a main road so easy for friends and taxis to find, nothing sexy nearby but good for basic reliable stay.

review.title: excellent value
review.reviewText: Very functional.  Spotless and extremely convenient to SFO.  Staff was very helpful.  If you have a rented car, it is incredibly convenient to get to rental return, turn east 3 blocks away and you head right into the rental car area.

managementResponses.response:
Dear guest, 

It is wonderful to hear that we have succeeded in providing you comfortable and pleasant accommodation. Thank you for your 1 night stay, we appreciate that you took the time to share your kind remarks about your visit in our hotel Thank you for your business.

review.reviewText: Was a nice welcome from pleasant staff. I found them all helpful. I was only overnighting and hadn't slept for a couple of days. It was quiet and the shuttle convenient. Left before breakfast

managementResponses.response:

review.title: Convenient location
review.reviewText: Decent hotel, but beds were very uncomfortable.  Also, the pillows were very hard, making it difficult to get comfortable. Wanted a single king bed, but they could only give us a room with two king beds.  Very little room for our toddler to play.
review.positiveRemarks: Good breakfast.  Very nice staff.  Nice feature to have outlets for charging phones, tablets on the lamps.
review.negativeRemarks: Senior discount would be nice.  Softer pillows.  One king bed instead of two in a room.  Bathtub stopper did not work. Used a washcloth to stop up tub
review.locationRemarks: We didn't explore the location.  We were there for an appointment  UCSF.  While it was not near the clinic, it was an easy drive to get there.

managementResponses.response:

We thank you for staying with us and we still hope that you will come and stay with us again in the near future. Thank you for your business.

review.title: Don't judge by picture on website
review.reviewText: I booked this hotel so I would be close to airport and for shuttle. Only to find that shuttle does not start until 4am and goes to other hotels before airport so I won't make my 5:15 am flight. The hotel looks like in good neighborhood by photo on your website. It is on a very busy street and my room is sidewalk level. I could have stayed at a better hotel with a free shuttle in a better neighborhood for just few dollars more. Now I have to pay for a taxi to the airport.

managementResponses.response:

review.title: First time visiting San Francisco
review.reviewText:
This is a nice hotel on the inexpensive side. The street in front doesn't do any favors for the hotel but not far away it becomes nicer. It is about a 15 minute walk to the BART rail transit system but you could also walk across the street to take the bus which will also take you to the BART.

.
review.negativeRemarks: The hotel itself is a bit dated inside but has been updated on the outside. Even though it is dated, it is still comfortable. The only difficulty was

review.title: Nice staff, but the hotel needs work
review.reviewText: The staff was outstanding but the "updates" and the room was clean, but were very poorly done. Some aspects of the hotel are extremely dated.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff was extremely friendly, outgoing, and accommodating. The room was quite clean and relatively inexpensive.
review.negativeRemarks: Quality of bedding, carpeting, and improvements were not stellar.
review.locationRemarks: The location was right on a busy road. We did not have time to explore the area.

review.title: I think it was great for the price.
review.reviewText: Great staff, shuttle, and clean rooms. I felt like I was at the Hilton. I think it was great for the price.
review.positiveRemarks: Great staff, shuttle, and clean rooms.
review.negativeRemarks: Add more to the breakfast

review.title: Nice hotel, clean, convenient and inexpensive
review.reviewText: Convenient location, inexpensive, close to subway, down town and restaurants
review.locationRemarks: great restaurants, interesting main street, conveniences. Free transportation to airport.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Close to airport, big rooms, free parking, free breakfast, I would recommend this hotel.  Don't be scared off by it being a Super 8.  Even had Matrix shampoo/conditioner, microwave, fridge, iron/ironing board, coffee maker.  No complaints!!!!!!  Can't beat it for the price.
review.negativeRemarks: This is being picky but it needed to be vacuumed behind dresser.
review.locationRemarks: There is a mall about a 20 minute walk that had a sports bar in front.  We walked and it was a safe area.  It is also close to airport.

review.title: Nice hotel.
review.reviewText: The hotel is clean, fairly new, well located near the San Francisco International Airport.  The hotel has WiFi, and most services like breakfast included but, the room available for breakfast is very small with the seating being a counter facing the wall, no table available.  The staff was very polite and available offering the free shuttle service to the airport.
review.positiveRemarks: The service and the cleanliness of the room
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast room bigger with table and chairs for the clients
review.locationRemarks: Near the city centre close to restaurants and local services

review.title: Great for our needs
review.reviewText: Needed a hotel near the airport in San Francisco. Room was available for early check in and was clean and comfortable. Bathroom is tiny and a needs some paint but was adequate. Wifi was fabulous. Parking excellent and location to the airport amazing. Day receptionist was not very friendly but night receptionist very nice. Made good recommendation for dinner.

review.title: A decent hotel in a fair location.
review.reviewText: OK for a one night stand. But some idiot in the room above us sounded like he was dropping bowling balls at 3 AM. We had a hard time sleeping. The room was decent   Breakfast was cereal and yogurt in a very crowded little space.

review.title: Nice Location
review.reviewText: This Super 8 was located where I needed it to be. The rooms and facilities were clean and looked newly renovated.
review.negativeRemarks: The breakfast could be better.
review.locationRemarks: It's near the airport and easy to find. Many restaurants right out the main door. Shopping malls less than a mile away.

review.title: Southwest vacation
review.reviewText: Close to SFO. Good price for location. Friendly staff.

review.title: Good proximity to the SFO airport.
review.reviewText: Staff was very accommodating with our special requests.
review.locationRemarks: there was a nice small town and very good Italian restaurant.

review.reviewText: Friendly welcome. Room was just as I hoped. Would definitely use this hotel again.

review.title: It's a great Hotel.
review.reviewText:
Easy to find from Payless car rental location, lots of parking spaces.  Lots of places to eat around the Hotel.
The staff was great in all the question that I had and I had lots of questions. From this location is so easy to drive in the Embarcadero every day.  It takes 2 minute to get on the Interstate 280 and goes right into the Embarcadero Drive. The Hotel bed were firm which I really like, room clean.  The breakfast area was small but it was fine. I would go back to this Hotel again. There was 6 adult in this group we had three rooms I believe they would say the same things as me.
review.negativeRemarks: A bigger breakfast area.
review.locationRemarks: Read the above.

review.title: Hotel
review.reviewText: A bit pricey, nice clean room. Room was close to the main entrance and dining area so it got noisy at times.

The person who check d us in was very nice I believe she was a manager. However the person that ch cod us out was not very fri badly and felt like I was interrupting her by checking out. It is a nice place to stay for one night, close to airport and free shuttle service to airport which is nic
review.positiveRemarks: Close to airport, free shuttle service
review.negativeRemarks: I think the hreakfast was minimal but good but the room was very crowds and people had to wait fo waffle maker as that is about all they had to offer
review.locationRemarks: Close to airport. Only there for one night

review.title: nice airport and  Bart line hotel
review.reviewText:
Hotel was nice- longish walk to Bart line- 
Terrible service between hotel and  airport-  way too long and  not punctual
review.negativeRemarks: service with Airport
review.locationRemarks: shopping mall- and bart access to city

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: Very clean rooms. Was in the area for business. Next trip will definitely go back.

review.title: Surprisingly good
review.reviewText: I stay in a lot of hotels - many are quite high end. I just needed a place to stay before an early morning flight so I opted for cheap just to see. Couldn't have been happier. Unfailingly polite staff, room was clean and nice enough, and while things like the soaps and shampoos weren't luxury, they were fine.  Really great experience - especially the staff - so helpful and friendly.

review.title: Should Be Super 10
review.reviewText: My daughters and I were looking for a reasonably priced hotel near SFO airport, for a weekend visit.  The Expedia price for the room was one of the lowest, so we gave it a try.  We found the hotel to be very nice. Newly renovated, fresh paint, carpet, tile, etc. My room had two queen size beds, with four pillows each.  Very comfortable.   Friendly staff, good location, free parking.
review.positiveRemarks: The overall quality of the hotel room was very nice.  Everything appeared to be brand new.
review.locationRemarks: Walking distance from a major drug store, some shops and restaurants.

review.title: Close to airport and to car rental return.
review.reviewText: Delightful help at check in.  Room could use some upgrades, though, with light fixtures showing wear and tear.  Also, there was some hard candy stuck to the carpet near the bed, suggesting that the room wasn't cleaned too carefully.
review.positiveRemarks: Near airport, relatively inexpensive (but still more expensive than hotels more distant from SFO).
review.negativeRemarks: Update fixtures; clean room better.

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: Hotel has free parking is well maintained and clean with helpful staff.
review.negativeRemarks: Improve breakfast assortment
review.locationRemarks: Good Mexican restaurant within walking distance.

review.title: Nice hotel near airport
review.reviewText: We stayed for one night there because we had to catch an early flight. It's only a few minutes away by car from the airport and it's clean an totally OK for one or a few nights. Parking lots are included.

review.title: Budget hotel near airport
review.reviewText: Not bad for a budget hotel. About 10 mins free shuttle ride from SFO airport. Small rooms, but adequately clean and comfortable. Free breakfast served in a small, crowded room but edible. AM desk clerk was consistently grumpy and uncommunicative, but PM was pleasant. Supermarket 100m down the road. A few places to eat nearby. 5 min bus ride or 20 min walk to San Bruno train station for commute to downtown San Francisco.
review.negativeRemarks: Attitude of the AM desk clerk.
review.locationRemarks: Supermarket 100m down the road. A few places to eat nearby. 5 min bus ride or 20 min walk to San Bruno train station for commute to downtown San Franc

review.title: Helpful, knowledgeable staff.
review.reviewText: Staff was most helpful, secured a wheelchair accessible shuttle to the airport.

review.title: Good choice
review.reviewText: Very friendly and helpful staff. Efficient shuttle service to the airport. Fast wifi and comfortable rooms. Close to good restaurants.
review.locationRemarks: Next door is a Mexican restaurant serving good food at reasonable prices

review.reviewText: The staff is friendly and ready to help. The price is not so competitive. Overall, it meets the expectations.
Overall grade would definitely go back there again great service great location

review.title: Close to Airport
review.reviewText: We stayed here 3 nights. We stayed here while visiting the area to save money. The hotel is exactly what was expected.
review.positiveRemarks: There is free parking. It was also close to the BART station.
review.negativeRemarks: The breakfast area was small and crowded when 4 or more people are there.

review.reviewText: The hotel is clean, modern and has friendly staff.
review.locationRemarks: one horse town. A few restaurants, a gun shop and a seedy casino around the corner. It's perfect.

review.title: Very Pleasant Stay
review.reviewText: Perhaps a little pricey, but Overall the staff, Monica , Mac, Perisha and  Pertisha were so helpful and always available to help in every way. Kudos to Housekeeping , as the facility was always kept clean with a warm smile from Housekeeping, Alana each morning. This location is a brief 8 minute ride from the airport and Transit is an easy short walk to get you where you need to go. We would recommend this Hotel and would consider staying here again.
review.negativeRemarks: keeping the smoking area cleaner
review.locationRemarks: Location is ideal, brief short ride to airport and freeway with easy access to the city area.

review.title: Close to airport
review.reviewText: Overall was a good motel for the price. Close to the airport and freeways.

review.negativeRemarks: The breakfast could have more choices,
review.locationRemarks: Airport and some restaurants close by.

review.title: Good location
review.reviewText: This hotel was clean staff was very helpful it was good for us , not to far from airport ,transport out the front , we could get around quite well , restaurants were near us this hotel was well suited to us.
review.negativeRemarks: Decorating
review.locationRemarks: Transportation & Dinning

review.title: Nice and convenient
review.reviewText:
We stayed 7 nights and even if the hotel is at 25mn of downtown SF it's super calm, the breakfast nice and the accommodations very pleasant.

review.title: Don't judge by the exterior
review.reviewText: Very rarely do I write experiences but I have to say that I am extremely happy about my stay at the Super 8. I prejudged the facility and thought great I'm in a weird neighborhood and my room might be a typical run down motel but I was wrong. They've remodeled the inside and it looks great ! The staff was so freaking nice everyone from the Manager in the morning to the evening crew at night. I was able to have some fun chit chats with the Front Desk staff and they showed great customer service. What I appreciated the most is how vigilant they were with constantly checking the cameras and the safety of the property. The continental breakfast was pretty bad but you can't complain about free food ! The only complaint I had was with the sheets and pillow cases having hair on them. I know the sheets and cases were washed because you could smell the bleach and soap (which by the way smells great!) but I had maybe about 15 pieces of long brown hair in random places.
review.positiveRemarks: Easy accessibility to the airport and the updated facility.
review.negativeRemarks: I know they wash their sheets and pillow cases but I had hair all over it. I could smell the bleach and soap they used so I know it was clean.

The room was fine with a king bed. The fridge was loud but I used earplugs. The next morning we had the continental breakfast early as they were setting it up, to catch the shuttle back to our flight. No problems, would definitely stay here again for the price as the shuttle and breakfast are included.

review.title: Close to everything we needed
review.reviewText: we booked a family trip to see some baseball and were looking for a hotel near San Fran that wouldn't break the bank. We found the listing here and booked. The combination of location to the city and highway/transit access was key. The twin king size was helpful for the family, the breakfast was basic but decent, there was ample free parking while we stayed. Eating around the hotel is no problem whether you want to walk or drive. The drive into the tourist areas of town is easy, but you could easily take transit as well.

review.title: Clean, Affordable, Convenient to Airport
review.reviewText: Positive experience.  I researched online reviews prior to booking, and my experience is that this hotel is appropriately rated.  The price was very affordable compared with other hotels, and is located reasonably close to the airport, Caltrain, and BART.  The shuttle to the airport is free, but it's about a 3/4 mile or 1.25 mile walk to the two train stations (respectively).  I walked back from the BART station around midnight; the neighborhood was reasonably safe and rather quiet.  The room and bathroom were clean and nicely furnished.  Internet and breakfast are free -- I believe parking is free as well (didn't have a car).  I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again if I'm in the San Francisco area .  The hotel is probably best suited to business people or couples traveling on a budget.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, convenient to airport & public transit, free breakfast, free internet, safe neighborhood, friendly & helpful staff, affordable.

We would definitely stay here again when visiting the Bay Area.

review.reviewText:
When I tried to open the door of the first room I was given, it was dead bolted - clearly already occupied. When I told this to the female at the front desk, she just shrugged and gave me another room. Not a good first impression.

The room was very basic but very comfortable. I checked in at 6pm and had to leave for the airport at 3am so it met my basic needs well and inexpensively.

When I left in the early morning, there was a different female at the desk and she was very helpful, polite and cheery.
review.positiveRemarks: The close location to the airport, free parking and the low cost.
review.negativeRemarks: The hallways looked like they had been recently but cheaply renovated and the street facing window curtains let in a lot of light.
review.locationRemarks: 10 minutes to San Francisco airport.

review.title: Nice stay.
review.reviewText:
We had a very short stay. The airport shuttle is important for us..
very nice. The staff is very nice and responsible. The hotel is very clean.

review.title: OK overnight between flights
review.reviewText: Got to SFO about 10 pm from Hawaii, waited 20 minutes for multi-hotel shuttle, 15 minute ride to Super 8. Street side ground floor room was somewhat noisy, but well-equipped. Small breakfast room did have waffle maker. 3 stop shuttle ride back to airport to catch flight east. Reasonable value for money.
review.negativeRemarks: breakfast space -- full had to bring tray back to room.
review.locationRemarks: NA

review.title: Nice Hotel, convenient location
review.reviewText: We were pleased with our stay at the Super 8 San Bruno. The room was clean, the beds comfortable, and the noise level acceptable, given the main street location. The breakfast was very good. A short drive away was the BART station, which took us to San Francisco, saving us the hassle of parking there. The staff was friendly.
review.positiveRemarks: Friendly staff, convenient location, excellent breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: The smell of the Mexican restaurant below the building, which filled the corridors (but not inside the room, thankfully)
review.locationRemarks: Big mall nearby, and the BART station

review.title: Excellent value. Great restaurant next door.
review.reviewText: A very convenient place to stay when flying in to or out of San Francisco. The Mexican restaurant next door has great food and reasonable prices. The hotel has just been redone with new carpets, floors, linens. Free, standard breakfast. I'd stay here again.

review.title: Decent place to stay overnight.
review.reviewText: I was skeptical of the motel from the outside, but our room was just fine. I really liked the decor and the room was clean. If you want a place to lay your head for one night on your way to the airport, this one will work. The price was better than most. The continental breakfast was pretty standard.

review.title: Nice and helpful staff.
review.reviewText: Public transportation is so so. 25...30 min walk to the closest BART. With Samtrans nearby the motel.
review.locationRemarks: Lots of shop at San Bruno BART. Good for shopping.

review.title: Clean hotel for quick overnight stay
review.reviewText: The staff was very nice and welcoming. The outside looks a little worn down, but once inside, the rooms were better than expected. They were in the midst of some remodeling right now, so I am sure will be better once complete. If you are just needing somewhere to stay for the night, and not wanting to spend a lot of time in the room, this will do the job just fine.
review.positiveRemarks: Convenient location to my business appointments.

review.title: very pleasant stay
review.reviewText: I enjoyed staying there. pleasant surroundings and atmosphere.
review.positiveRemarks: the surroundings and friendliness. nice breakfast

review.title: i was amazed by this hotel!
review.reviewText: This is actually better than the best western nearby. awesome!

review.title: great service
review.reviewText: The staff was very friendly and accommodating! They allowed us an early check-in so we had a safe place to leave our luggage while we explored the city. The shuttle service to the airport was great and got us there in plenty of time for our flight. We took the 4 am shuttle, and the hotel clerk offered us items from the continental breakfast which doesn't normally start until 6 am, so that was very much appreciated by my tired family and hungry teenagers!

review.title: Close to airport and on major highways
review.reviewText: Clean =freindly staff-easy to find from any place- good starter breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: All OK for Dollars spent
review.locationRemarks: Very convenient

review.title: business trip
review.reviewText: stayed here many times, great price for the room, locarion, and fast wifi.
review.negativeRemarks: only found some debris on corpet when check in.

review.title: business trip
review.reviewText: stayed here many times, great price for the room, locarion, and fast wifi.
review.negativeRemarks: only found some debris on corpet when check in.

review.title: Nice stay in the outskirts of San Francisco.
review.reviewText: It was a great experience. I forgot the person who initially helped us, started with the P. Really nice woman. The entire staff was great. Nice, comfortable rooms.
review.positiveRemarks: I liked the breakfast and parking.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing.
review.locationRemarks: There's not a lot to do nearby, but it beats the prices of the hotels in the Mecca of San Francisco. I didn't mind the 15 minute drive to Frisco.

review.title: Free Shuttle Ride To/From Airport!
review.reviewText: We enjoyed our stay there. Shuttle leaves every 1/2 hour to and from airport. Free continental breakfast. Sam was great. Thanks!

review.title: Free Shuttle Ride To/From Airport!
review.reviewText: We enjoyed our stay there. Shuttle leaves every 1/2 hour to and from airport. Free continental breakfast. Sam was great. Thanks!

review.title: Very Nice!
review.reviewText: This is the perfect airport hotel. It is 10 minutes by free shuttle to SFO, the staff is friendly and helpful, the facility is clean and solid, the rooms are well furnished, there is a free basic starter breakfast to get you going. With rates under $100 I will stay here again, in fact we are reserved here again in a few days..

review.title: Surprisingly nice and clean
review.reviewText: More like a hotel rather than a motel. Also easy to find, very nice!

review.title: Good hotel, near SFO airport
review.reviewText: Very good and convenient hotel. Room is pretty big and has working table, refirdgerator and microvawe. Very good internet connection. Ideal for staying near San Francisco airport or in South San Franciso area.
review.negativeRemarks: Bed is too soft
review.locationRemarks: 5 minutes to San Francisco international airport

review.title: Nice hotel, close to the airport and amenities.
review.reviewText:
Great for a single night; very clean rooms. A few things to bear in mind though:
1- There are a few very good hotel options nearby (Country Club, Holiday Inn, etc.). So
if you do not mind spending a bit more, you might want to check them out too.
2- Bed mattresses are too stiff and you might not find them very comforting
3- Parking could be a problem (back of the hotel but rather small)
4- Kitchen is way too small
5- Can hear the noise from the next room (like the phone ringing). But not to the point
of annoyance.
5- Only one bathroom sink for a double queen bedroom.
6- Very friendly staff

review.title: Ok for the price
review.reviewText: I guess I was expecting "more" because of all the great reviews. The place was clean enough and definitely cheap, but it was a hassle getting a shuttle from the airport and the walls are paper-thin. It's not quiet and it smelled a little weird. The bed was comfortable and it had all the amenities you'd want in a hotel. But it was just ok. I did really like the little Mexican restaurant that adjoins it.
review.negativeRemarks: Get rid of the weird, overly-chemicalized smell. Or not. Maybe it's covering up something worse.
review.locationRemarks: The Mexican restaurant next store was tasty.

review.title: Good airport hotel for SFO
review.reviewText:
We have stayed here three years running - using it as a convenient stopover on our way from and too the UK. This budget hotel was up to its usual excellent standard for this year's visit.

The rooms have always been clean and comfortable and the breakfast, when we have the opportunity to have it, is perfectly adequate.

The complimentary shuttle bus , to and from the airport, has always been reliable - you have to call the hotel on the free phone at the airport hotel bus stop, however the wait is usually no more than 15 min.
review.locationRemarks: Caltrain stop, for San Francisco centre is about 10 minutes walk from hotel. There is a Walgreens and a fast food restaurant nearby.

review.title: Only good thing is the location close to the airpo
review.reviewText:
Room that smells of smoke.
Pretty run down place.
Lousy breakfast.

Only thing good going for it is the location close to airport and reasonable easy to find asian food along Real Camino Rd

review.title: A place to rest on your trip.
review.negativeRemarks: The internet service is not as they promised. I stayed at the hotel one night and only connected the wifi 2 hours. Nothing happened after complain.

review.reviewText: We did not spend much time in the hotel. Our flight was delayed, we arrived at 5am. and checked out at 11am. So far, so good. It worked out just fine.

review.title: Close to SFO, efficient shuttle, free breakfast.
Very close to airport
review.reviewText: Hotel is OK, but it is very noisy because it's close to airport as well as highway. So you can hear plane taking off and landing constantly plus the cars passing by on highway. So your sleep will definitely affected. Other than the noise, bed and comforter and pillows are comfortable. Breakfast is OK.

review.title: Shuttle was prompt-- reservation was there--
review.reviewText: Clean and quiet room
review.locationRemarks: close to airport did not go out

review.title: Very good, near SFO airport
review.reviewText: Very good anf non expensive hotel just 5 minutes driving from San-Francisco International airport
review.negativeRemarks: Bed is too soft

review.reviewText:
Clean, convenient to SF airport (free shuttle), very reasonably priced.
The setup with the sink outside of the bathroom was rather inconvenient, but this is the only thing that we didn't like about the place, other than that it was excellent for the price.

review.title: Super 8...not Gr8, but very adequate
review.reviewText: 2 Couples needed inexpensive room for one night to visit relative in So. San Francisco. The price was right and had easy access to our location. Bathrooms are small...but - adequate! Beds were extremely comfortable. Our room was next to the elevator but we heard no noise either from the elevator, airplanes or the other inhabitants. There is a small 'breakfast' room with some tables and chairs to eat at if you don't want to take it back to your room. There are trays if you do want to. They have a waffle maker, cereals, packaged pastries, coffee, juice, yogurt, fruit, etc. There might have been more but there was a big SF 49ers game early afternoon and I think almost everyone else but us were going to the game, so it was hard to tell how much other food there might have been because it was sort of a madhouse in the room with people grabbing stuff. Very little interaction with the staff but they seemed pleasant and helpful enough. We did have to get another set of towels because there were only 3 sets there. The rooms have a microwave and one of those little coffee makers and hair dryers also an ironing board and iron hanging on the wall right in the room?? Oh well. the important this was it was a darn good bed and a really good price through Expedia.
review.locationRemarks: The location is on a very big main street with lots of other motels and businesses. There is a big mall close by.

review.title: Convenient to airport
review.reviewText: Good for the price. We stayed overnight for an early departure from SFO. A little noisy. Bathroom could have been cleaner.
review.negativeRemarks: Cleanliness of bathroom. Someone elses hair in shower/tub

review.title: Good hotel for SFO
review.reviewText: The staff was friendly and helpful.
review.positiveRemarks: It is a comfortable hotel and about 20 minutes to the airport with free shuttle. It has coffee in the room as well as a safe, microwave and fridge.
review.negativeRemarks: we missed having a small table with chairs for playing games

review.title: Served nicely for airport departure.
review.reviewText:
Amenities were just as needed, internet access, airport shuttle, comfortable bed.
A suggestion to the hotel, for travelers needing to leave before breakfast begins, offer a bagel and fruit to grab and go. It's nice to have a little something for the road, often you're headed for a full day of travel.
The hotel was just what we needed, staff were helpful and friendly.
We would stay there again.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast to "grab and go", such as a bagel and fruit, for travelers needing to leave early.
review.locationRemarks: We used it prior to flying out the next day. Places to eat were within easy walking distance.

review.title: Very handy for airport.
review.reviewText: The hotel is clean & tidy, staff very friendly, 2 minutes to check in , room big, microwave and fridge in room.Didn,t try breakfast as had early flight. We had a room overlooking main road, didn,t hear any noise from road. Shops and eateries near, "ihop" across road.Shuttle bus on time, cookies and fruit was provided as a snack ( we left @ 04:00. All in all a good hotel , will definitely stay again. Handy for San Fran, BART across road.
review.positiveRemarks: Handy for airport,good prices, clean and comfortable.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast tea bags in rooms , only coffee available, tea bags can be obtained from reception.
review.locationRemarks: Mainly handy for airport and BART station.

review.positiveRemarks: Close to the airport with a shuttle

review.title: Complimentary airport shuttle and breakfast
review.reviewText: Good for overnight stay - hotel is close to the airport. A hotel shuttle service is provided which picks up other hotel guests along the way. The shuttle took about 15-20 minutes to reach the airport. Not a great area, but it seemed safe enough. Breakfast was nothing to write home about - your usual unhealthy processed options (e.g. cinnamon buns, etc). Would be nice to see some healthier breakfast options such as fruit, oatmeal, etc.
review.negativeRemarks: More healthy breakfast options such as fruit, oatmeal, etc.
review.locationRemarks: Location is okay - I wouldn't be wandering around at night. There is a decent Mexican food restaurant right next door to the hotel.

review.title: Convenient hotel close to SFO airport
review.reviewText: It is a convenient hotel to go and back from San Francisco airport. Very practical but nothing more or less.
review.negativeRemarks: Bath tub stopper was not working properly.
review.locationRemarks: Very convenient to go back from the Air port. However, there is absolutely nothing to do around the hotel. Room rate is comparatively high.

review.title: Very close to freeway and restaurants.
review.reviewText: The hotel was centralized to all of San Francisco by being close to the freeway access, restaurants, Greyhound station and Candlestick Park. We were in town for a Niner game. It wouldn't of been nice if there was a pool or gym. The beds were very lumpy. Very uncomfortable. But we enjoyed our stay and would recommend to friends and family.

review.title: Clean and Comfortable But Ordinary
review.reviewText: When we first arrived I was a little disappointed at our choice, because I am used to staying in Marriott's. But the hotel was considerably clean and the beds were actually very comfortable (and I have back issues). There was a work area for one laptop and the usual TV, Fridge, Microwave. There was 3 of us and we were not overcrowded. The one thing I did miss is having a comfortable chair to sit in and a table to play cards at. There was a side chair, but it wasn't where you could watch TV while sitting it in, so the only place to watch TV was lying in bed. The breakfast was typical continental breakfast in a very small, crowded room with only 4 small tables, so if no table was available we had to take our breakfast up to our room. The free parking was nice to have after seeing what the parking prices were in San Francisco. Hotel was convenient to airport, and about 20 min from downtown. We did miss having a pool/Jacuzzi, but for the price we paid, it was acceptable and comfortable.
review.negativeRemarks: The breakfast room needs to be bigger

review.title: Great place
review.reviewText: Great place.

review.title: Surprisingly nice hotel close to the airport
review.reviewText: This hotel was surprisingly nice and clean. I was not excited to stay at a super 8 but this hotel was more than decent. The cheapest one I could find close to the airport and I was pleasantly surprised. I know there were nice little perks but I didn't utilize them so I can't comment on them.

review.title: A little off the beaten track
review.reviewText: We found the comfortable and clean. Staff were friendly and the atmosphere good.
review.positiveRemarks: Comfortable for the cost, the free breakfast and airport shuttle were great
review.negativeRemarks: A bigger dining room
review.locationRemarks: The hotel was some miles from San Francisco and it did take a bit of time working out the train system. Within walking distance for shopping and food

review.title: Close to the airport. Great breakfast.
review.reviewText: We enjoyed the complementary breakfast and the bed was comfortable.

review.title: A great place to stay for a couple of nights.
review.reviewText: This was a great price and we used it as a base for travelling in to San Francisco each day. The room was quite spacious with the added benefit of a fridge and microwave. The breakfast area was small but we didn't have any problems getting a seat each day. There was a good selection at breakfast. The staff were really nice and helpful. In particular, Sam was very good and he always helped out with a smile. We appreciate that sort of service. It was close by to places to eat.
review.locationRemarks: Easy to get in to the city. You can get the shuttle up to the airport to catch the BART in to town or walk 8 mins to the Caltrain and it's cheaper.

review.title: Fine for what it is...
review.reviewText: Hotel is very close to the airport room was clean price perfect

review.title: Hotel close to SFO
review.reviewText: Liked the location for a clean, quiet rest before flying out on an early flight. Airport shuttle is shared between a number of hotels in the area so you need to allow an extra amount of time when using.
review.locationRemarks: Easy access to San Francisco

review.title: Good value and location
review.reviewText: We stayed here the night before our departure from SFO. It was convenient and had shuttle service. The Mexican restaurant next door was great. The hotel was clean and everything went according to plan. Not many frills, but it worked well for its intended purpose.
review.positiveRemarks: Convenience and the restaurant next door.
review.negativeRemarks: Bigger bathrooms.
review.locationRemarks: Near SFO.

review.title: Airport convenience
review.reviewText: Convenient to airport. Good shuttle provision to airport for both flights and connection to BART to get to city.

review.title: Convenient
review.reviewText: Nice and cozy room. Heard from the staff the hotel was recently renovated. Clean and tidy.

review.title: clean, comfortable and close to the airport
review.reviewText: only stayed one night. the hotel was well maintained. go to the Mexican restaurant next door it is excellant

review.title: Convenient location near to airport
review.reviewText:
Stayed here for 3 nights and even though it was a bit further out from downtown San Francisco it was easy to get there with the shuttle bus available to and from the airport. Rooms were a good size, with TV (we didn't spend much time there) and in the mornings a good spread for breakfast available - drinks, fruit, waffle, cereal, cakes etc

We are planning on coming back very soon!
review.positiveRemarks: Location to Airport, shuttle service, rooms, breakfast facilities
review.negativeRemarks: Bigger breakfast room, a couple of mornings there were long queues of people waiting to sit down in breakfast room.
review.locationRemarks: Location to airport is near, we didn't go out nearby, used this as a base rather than downtown San Francisco

review.title: We were tourists with a lot of questions.
review.reviewText: The staff answered questions about Bart, returning the rental car,even some breakfast for an early flight.They were busy but took the time to help me with anything that I needed.
review.negativeRemarks: The room did not smell fresh .Had an smell about it.
review.locationRemarks: Its San Francisco so plenty to do.Went to fishermans wharf for crab and ride the street cars,and feel the electricity of the city.

review.title: Great location to stay at
review.reviewText: The Hotel is just a few minutes from the airport and easy access to the freeway system. We had a rental car and there was ample FREE parking. The price was great compared to the prices at Fishermans Wharf or the Downtown Hotel's. Our room was very quiet, and we were even on the street side. All the desk people were very friendly. The room was nice and the bed was comfy. We did not eat the breakfast there because we always left early, so I can not rate that. Check in and check out was super quick. We stayed 4 nights and would stay there again if we return to the San Francisco area..
review.locationRemarks: Not far to the Golden Gate Bridge, Alcatraz, Fishermans Wharf, or downtown

review.title: Good location, priced right, and comfortable
review.reviewText: The hotel was in a good location accessible to the airport, easy drive downtown, or by public transit. It was clean and comfortable, breakfast was included and the price was reasonable.

review.title: Second stay at a Super 8
review.reviewText:
Vacationing I got the opportunity to book through Expedia my first time a Super 8 in Monterrey. Impressed by the location it was to have such nice stay and pleasant room and service. That made my decision to book another Super 8 near the airport in San Bruno near the San Francisco International airport and I couldn't be happier together with my fiancee of the kind of service, room and cleanliness of this motel too. I have noticed that these Motels or Hotels are owned by families and wherever they are either on the front desk they are always so pleasant in taking care of passengers staying at their place. Looking forward to book more Super 8 s in the future.
For sure I will recommend it to my friends from overseas.
review.positiveRemarks: Cleaniless, comfortable and service from the time arrival to the time checking out.
review.negativeRemarks: On these last two stays actually didn't see anything that need to improve.
review.locationRemarks: Near the airport, making it so easy just to stay and travel early or if any arrival late just to stay there before going home in another county.

review.title: Great for one night stay during your layover
review.reviewText: I stayed in the hotel during my 11 hour layover. It's very close to SFO. The hotel isn't fancy & upscale but it's very clean and comfortable. The hotel staff was friendly and helpful. I enjoyed the breakfast as well. The free shuttle bus is available between the hotel and SFO. I would come back here again.

review.title: OK for an airport stopover
review.reviewText: Got there late, left early for plane. No ambience but functional and convenient. Would not be inclined to stay there again.
review.negativeRemarks: Glasses and basic crockery in room.
review.locationRemarks: Non-area. Just a stopover place.

review.title: Close to the Cal-Train Station
review.reviewText: This is a good budget hotel. It has free parking, wireless, breakfast a decent room and it is not far (walkable distance) from San Bruno Cal-Train station. No glitter or gold but a comfortable place to stay outside San Francisco.
review.positiveRemarks: Good bargain. All the amenities I need for a good price
review.negativeRemarks: nothing
review.locationRemarks: As I said, the train station at hand (5 mins walk)

review.title: San Francisco Airport Motel
review.reviewText: Spent two days. Desk was open 24/7 which accommodated our middle of the night arrival. Front desk staff was familiar with local area and the city and provided us with needed information on how to get places. Free parking had enough spaces for guests.
review.positiveRemarks: Maid did NOT knock on our door or make any noise in the hallway. We arrived and slept at odd times and needed quiet.
review.negativeRemarks: The street outside this hotel was busy but not unusually busy for this type of location.
review.locationRemarks: San Francisco Airport was conveniently located. Plenty of food places and shopping areas nearby to pick up the essentials.

review.title: Good location for SF airport
review.reviewText: Great place to stay near airport. Fine for families. clean. great staff. decent continental breakfast

review.title: Nice hotel, close to the airport
review.reviewText:
- Rooms and bathrooms are clean.
- Stay was comfortable.
- The staff is very helpful.
- Close to the airport, though that makes it a bit away from the main tourist attractions.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast space as it becomes very crowded

review.title: Brilliant place!
review.reviewText: The staff were friendly and very helpful, the room was a good size with a comfy bed and large bathroom. The location of the motel is brilliant, very quick to get to the airport, San Francisco City, a shopping mall, stores- we were very impressed and will definitely stay here next time we're in town.
review.positiveRemarks: Couldn't ask for a better location

review.title: Basic but just as required
review.reviewText: Hotel was exactly as needed for us. Somewhere to crash before an AM flight home. Staff were helpful, room was clean, beds were comfortable. Breakfast was basic with a bowl of cereal and cup of coffee, but after two weeks of USA breakfasts it was absolutely fine. One bit of advice is tray and arrive before 9.00pm otherwise your choice of food is limited to an IHOP or WENDYs.
review.positiveRemarks: Simple and convenient with free Airport Shuttle
review.locationRemarks: Basic. Safe to walk round despite not maybe looking that attractive

review.title: Good value for money
review.reviewText:
Friendly welcome, manager was helpful with any queries we had. If you want to spend a day in San Francisco and you don't want to drive in/pay high car park fees then you can use the Super 8 shuttle to an from the airport and then get on the BART.

Room was clean, breakfast was Ok by American standards. The dining area is small and many people had to take the breakfast back to their rooms to eat it.

Overall good value for money.

review.title: convenient close to the airport
review.reviewText: Perfectly serviceable, clean and practical. Not a place for a romantic getaway but an excellent spot to regroup after a long flight or clean up after a camping tour of northern California.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, ample parking, close to the airport, 2 good Mexican restaurants in the immediate vicinity.
review.negativeRemarks: Mediocre breakfast bar and menu. With a full suite of guests the staff seems to give up and abandon it instead of resupplying faster.
review.locationRemarks: The hotel is located on El Camino Real, the major service/shopping strip of San Bruno.

review.title: Good Stay
review.reviewText: The staff were friendly and helpful, our room was comfortable and clean. No problems at all, I would recommend this motel if needing accommodation near the airport. Well done Super 8.

review.title: Great hotel, great location
review.reviewText: Was very pleased with my experience. Was a reasonable rate for the amenities provided. This was not a "knock your socks off" hotel as far as amenities go, but I don't think that's their mission. Free breakfast was nice. Room was clean. Hotel staff was helpful and nice.
review.negativeRemarks: Bathroom lighting. Too dim.
review.locationRemarks: In the heart of San Bruno, very close to the airport. A quick drive up to the City or down to San Jose.

review.title: OK
review.reviewText: THE STAFF WAS GREAT, BUT I THOUGHT OUR ROOM COULD HAVE BEEN A LITTLE CLEANER, THE COFFEE POT HAD NOT BEEN CLEANED PROPERLY AND NEEDED EXTRA CARE. THE SHEETS WERE A LITTLE SCRATCHY. OTHER THAN THAT, FOR THE MONEY, IT WAS OK, AND YOU GET A LITTLE BREAKFAST.

review.title: Exellent hotel
review.reviewText: Everything was good and especially front staff was really kind but toilet fliahing sound is kinda embrassing due to loud like the flushing toilet at the airplane.( this is not a problem im just saying for fun lol)

review.title: nice hotel
review.reviewText: pretty good hotel close to the airport only 20 minutes from downtown San Francisco

review.title: Good value! Nice staff...
review.reviewText: Close to airport! Free shuttle...Good service. Close to transportations!

review.title: Comfortable, spacious and clean :)
review.reviewText: Stayed here for a four night stopover while flying from the UK to NZ. I give it a 100% score bearing in mind that it is a 2 star hotel - so no luxury and a basic breckie, but is a clean, comfortable place to stay. Up sides - a clean, comfortable and very spacious room with air con that was very effective (I put it down to a very low temperature, then got cold so turned it up a bit). I asked for a quiet room and was put on the away-from road side of the building. Occasionally heard noise from the hall but pretty rare and not at a level that was a problem. Staff were friendly though mostly I didn't interact with them as there were no problems. I enjoyed making waffles in the machine for breakfast (they also had toast, bagels, cereal, yogurt, fruit juices, tea and coffee). They stored my luggage for the day after checking out as my flight was in the evening. Down sides - the air conditioning was quite loud while active (though it didn't actually bother me, I just noticed it), the breakfast room is very small for the hotel size, and at times there was a queue and not enough tables. The BART is about a 20-25 minute walk away ... which seemed like nothing in the morning, but on the way back in the evening felt quite far!! That said, there is a bus that goes right past the door and stops at the BART station if you don't want to walk, or the (slower) free option is taking the airport shuttle (which was fantastic to get to and from the airport) to the airport BART station.
review.positiveRemarks: Was just what I expected when booking. Had everything I needed, nice and clean, an easy and good experience that was reasonably cheap.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing, was as I expected.
review.locationRemarks: I was here to visit San Francisco, so a bit of a hike to get to the city, but I knew that booking. Nice places to eat nearby and good bus service.

review.title: Great place to stay south of San Francisco.
review.reviewText: This place is very conveniently located about a mile from Tanforan Mall, which means easy access to food, shopping (including Target), and a BART station. I stayed here as part of a road trip to San Francisco, so it was great to be able to park at the BART and take advantage of public transit to see the city. The room had nice decor, though the bathroom is a bit on the small side. The refrigerator is a good size for stocking up on drinks and snacks. The complimentary breakfast was all carbs, with breads, pastries, and a waffle maker.

review.title: Super 8
review.reviewText: This hotel was very Clean, you can tell that this hotel has just recently been remodeled. The breakfast was just the perfect amount and the staff was very friendly.

review.title: Close to San Francisco airport with free shuttle
review.reviewText: We just needed an inexpensive hotel for the night, so that we could make our VERY early morning flight. We were pleasantly surprised to get a large room, with an amazingly nice manager to check us in. The shuttle to the airport was free, and available 4 AM to midnight. When we got up in the AM to catch the shuttle, the nice night clerk insisted that we take bananas and sweet rolls to eat at the airport. What a nice place!

review.title: Ideal for an overnight stay
review.reviewText:
Checked-in after just getting off plane from the UK. Check-in was good, room was clean and had everything that we needed for a 1 night stay.

Represented excellent value for money!!
review.positiveRemarks: Free WiFi, complimentary breakfast - spaciousness of room - courtesy of staff.
review.negativeRemarks: Main road location.

review.title: Chosen because close to airport
review.reviewText: Hotel was not in a very nice neighborhood. Would not leave the hotel under any circumstances after dark.
review.locationRemarks: There was a Mexican restaurant next to the hotel which we used for dinner. There were other restaurants one street over but the neighborhood was bad.

review.title: Good stopover hotel
review.reviewText: The staff were friendly, the bed was really comfortable and the breakfast buffet surpassed our expectations.
review.locationRemarks: Easy to find from SFO and parking was good.

review.title: Great stay at Super 8
review.reviewText: Hotel staff was friendly and very helpful. Hotel was at a great location and the room was perfect. Also greatly enjoyed the continental breakfast provided.
review.positiveRemarks: Enjoyed the free continental breakfast and the friendly, helpful staff. The room was pleasing as well.
review.negativeRemarks: The toilet flushes loudly. I would have liked more than two options for cereal.
review.locationRemarks: The location was ideal being only minutes from the airport. It also was close to a mall and food places as well as my bank.

review.title: Amazing deal for the price!
review.reviewText: This hotel met our family's needs exactly! We wanted a place to stay while we were sight-seeing in San Francisco and going on college visits. I was alone with my 3 teens and we felt safe and had enough room. The price was right and the amenities were just what we needed - double QUEENS to fit our teens and a nice complimentary breakfast that not only had waffles, but fruit and yogurt too! We drove the short distance to the BART station and took the subway into the city where we used the Hop on Hop off sightseeing busses to get around and also did our fair share of walking! Clearly, you are not going to get luxury for the price we paid, but we got safety, cleanliness, large. comfy beds, helpful service, breakfast to start our days and convenient location.

review.title: Don't let looks fool you!
review.reviewText: From the outside, this hotel doesn't look like much, but it offers free parking, clean, comfy, non smoke smelling rooms, free airport shuttle and its close to Tanforan Mall and freeway entrance/exits. I was able to use the computer in the lobby prior to catching the free airport shuttle to print out my boarding pass--cannot beat the efficiency of this hotel--although very small, but I think that's why they can provide good service too.
review.positiveRemarks: Everything! I had been searching for a decent hotel with all the amenities I needed and this hotel fit the bill. I would definitely stay here again!
review.locationRemarks: Tanforan Mall is about a mile away. Lots of food courts, movie theaters and stores

review.title: Great Super 8
review.reviewText: Very friendly staff.Great breakfast.Good location for getting to centre of town.bus then train.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing
review.locationRemarks: Great if you have a car,not quite as good without but still ok

review.title: Front desk staff on all shifts very friendly
review.reviewText: Stayed 5 nights and enjoyed ourselfs.Very nice rooms and close to airport.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing comes to mind.
review.locationRemarks: Mexican resturant next door,Relitives live in area.

review.title: Easy for airport drop
review.reviewText: It is what it is, cheap and close to the airport. Nice people working there, shuttle was fast, everything was good. Not the greatest area but I wasn't looking to move in just get a nights sleep and that is gave me.

review.title: Nice place for close access to SFO
review.reviewText: For what it is, it is excellent. Would stay again for an early morning flight out of SFO.

review.title: Very good and close to SFO Airport
review.reviewText: Very good hotel for this rate. Great location near SFO airport. Hotel is clean, comfortable, staff is very friendly. Breakfast is acceptable, hotel has its own parking. Rooms equipment is very good, rooms are big enough. Area is pretty quiet (even fronside rooms).
review.negativeRemarks: The bed is too soft

review.title: Ok....
review.reviewText: Hotel was old but clean definitely nothing fancy. They offered a decent continental breakfast and airport shuttle was great it ran every half hour. Don't think I would stay there again but good price for just a one night stay. Staff was good.

review.title: Average hotel for the price
review.reviewText: The area was a little strange at night, but day time it is OK. Room was average except that air conditioning was not working properly.
review.positiveRemarks: One thing worth mentioning is that their towels were verrrrry comfortable! The best I've used in such level hotel.
review.negativeRemarks: As mentioned, air-conditioner wasn't working very well. The wall-mounted unit kept stopping unless I set the fan to be constantly on, and it was loud.
review.locationRemarks: Convenient for the airport stay.

review.title: Great Hotel for Access to San Francisco
review.reviewText: Cannot beat this hotel for price in this location. Room was clean and nice and the bed was very comfortable. Free shuttle to SFO (airport) which also provided access to the BART system which provides easy access to all of San Francisco and Bay area.
review.positiveRemarks: Good bed, clean room and easy access to airport and public transportation.

review.title: Yeah buddy
review.reviewText: I enjoyed my stay here. Quite and comfy. Food was great and all.
review.positiveRemarks: The up to dateness of the room
review.negativeRemarks: I had to leave because it was time to. Lol
review.locationRemarks: It is close to the airport and not far from the golden gate bridge.

review.title: Good hotel and close to SFO airport!
review.reviewText: Friendly staff and the parking was great. The continental breakfast was superb. Also - the maps of SF and Fisherman's Wharf were terrific. We used them the entire day. Thank you for a good stay and rest. We will come back!!

review.title: Great night sleep
review.reviewText: I really enjoy staying in this hotel, but one of the things that I notice or was a big thing for me is that this hotel does not have a first aid kid. But other than that everything was great.
review.positiveRemarks: It was a really clean hotel, it was close to everything I needed, and enjoyed my sleep.
review.negativeRemarks: The only thing I could say is the they don't have a first aid kit.
review.locationRemarks: I love the location it was just clos to everything. Everything was just blocks away

review.title: Nice hotel near the airport.
review.reviewText: While this is a older hotel, it has received nice upgrades/upkeep. For a Super 8 the rooms actually have a little character. Bed was very comfortable. Located next to some excellent local restaurants that are easy to walk to. Shuttle was on time and transferred me to the airport rather quickly - about 10 minutes. Room faced neighborhoods, which is a nice change from facing parking lots or strip malls.
review.positiveRemarks: Location and the fact it had guest laundry.

review.title: OK
review.reviewText: The room is OK, but the toilet seems old.The breakfast cafe is too small. The parking lot is relatively small.

review.title: Nice Motel
review.reviewText: It's a good, clean motel. For the price, it's nice.

review.title: Ok for overnight
review.reviewText:
The hotel was fine enough for one night, but I'm not sure I'd want to stay there much longer than that. The breakfast in the morning was fine, only two pillows on the bed. We also checked for bed bugs and didn't find any -- found a few stains, but the hotel seems to take decent measures prevent beg bugs.

My husband forgot shaving cream and asked the front desk if there was a place close enough he could walk to find some -- they said they didn't know of any place, which sent him to walking towards gas stations to check if they had any. We later found out there was a walgreens just around the corner from the hotel in the opposite direction he had gone. To say the least he was a bit frustrated.
review.positiveRemarks: Relatively close to airport, well lit parking lot.

review.title: Stay at San Bruno Super 8
review.reviewText: Great place to stay --- very affordable for us. It gives us just what we want, without unnecessary frills.

review.title: Pleasant stay
review.reviewText: Older hotel, obviously recently remodeled and very nice job. Admittedly, at first I had reservations about the age of the building (although it is in the San Francisco area and most buildings are on the older side) and the lobby is rather run of the mill motel-ish. But size of the room, cleanliness, comfort of the bed, and the fabulous large print of the Golden Gate Bridge won me over. I saw what my friends had for a third more of the cost, was glad I was staying where I was. Well located, near BART station, airport, shopping, plenty of food places to choose from, I had no complaints with exception of the need to have shower curtain installed in the bath area. The room I stayed in had large-jacuzzi style- tub with shower head. I shower only and would have liked to have a shower curtain. Other than that, the entire stay for my visit was pretty nice. Good value, I'd recommend as ok place to stay.
review.positiveRemarks: cleanliness and size of room, good bed
review.negativeRemarks: no shower curtain
review.locationRemarks: near SFO, BART, shopping.

review.title: Great room for stay before flying out of S.F.
review.reviewText: Hotel is well located for the airport. Our room was the neatest, most attractive we have seen in a long time. Shuttle to the airport was punctural and convenient.
review.locationRemarks: Good for airport.

review.title: fine overnight spot
review.reviewText: Convenient and close to SFO. Shuttle and free parking. Free breakfast

review.title: friendly staff
review.reviewText: this is a case of get what you pay for. we needed a hotel close to airport for a one night stay as our flight landed at 10 p.m. and the next flight out home left at 8 a.m. all we really needed was a clean room and a bed to sleep in and that is what we got. the staff was extremely courteous. we called the front desk to see what time the next shuttle to the airport was in the morning and he told us it had just pulled up and that since we were on our way down he would have them wait on us which really helped since it would have been at least 30 minutes to next shuttle. didn't eat their breakfast so cannot comment on that. not a lot of amenities. hotel is in an older building and hallways are kind of narrow but again if you are just looking for somewhere to basically crash for a few nights at a really reasonable price, this is the place for you. if you want a lot of fancy, you need to go somewhere else,
review.negativeRemarks: elevator was small

review.title: easy to find and great for the price
review.reviewText: We have used this hotel several times when we have an early morning flight out of San Francisco. It is very convenient. They offer a continental breakfast and a very early bus to the airport. I would recommend staying here. It is relatively quite place with few disruptions.
review.positiveRemarks: the van ride to the airport
review.negativeRemarks: parking lot is VERY compact, don't drive a large pickup
review.locationRemarks: on the main drag, very easy to find

review.title: Lovely hotel!
review.reviewText: Lovely Super 8. Great price. Close to the airport.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport.

review.title: good for a couple traveling on a budget.
review.reviewText: Fairly clean. Room service brought clean towels every day. complimentary breakfast. polite staff.

review.title: Weekend Getaway/49ers Game
review.reviewText: The hotel was nice. The lobby and hallways were outdated, but the rooms were very modern. Flat screen TV's, and a very nice TV stand/Desk.
