The King Size bed we had was very comfortable. The breakfast each morning was a nice touch, and the waffles are great (you make them yourself, it's quite fun). The girl at the front desk checked us into the wrong room at first, but quickly corrected it. She was not very friendly, but that's not going to stop us from staying there again.

review.title: Great value for such low price
review.reviewText: You get what you pay for. But quite surprised with very good service and a decent breakfast. Out of my 3 different stays here, I had a problem with heater just once and they promptly moved me to another room.

review.title: air condition problem
review.reviewText: The air condition is cold at night. It works at the beginning two days, but later, it does not work any more.

review.title: OK if needing to crash before an early flight
review.reviewText:
Really this should be 2.5 stars. It is about 5-8 minutes from the airport, which is why we stayed there. We had an early flight the next day. The hotel is on a busy road and there are plenty of places to eat in the area and shop as there is a mall down the road. The look of the rooms has obviously been recently updated to look modern with dark tiger wood looking furniture and huge Black and White pictures of San Francisco above the beds. Unfortunately, the room still had the signature uncomfortable old beds, cheap sheets & towels, very small room, and old feeling bathroom (although it had been painted) that Super 8's are known for.
The room was clean enough and I appreciate that they have made efforts to update the look of the rooms, but I do wish that these places would put more energy into a comfortable mattress and decent bedding! It seemed quiet and safe enough for a night, but I did not have a good night's sleep on that bed!
review.positiveRemarks: The large Black & White pictures of San Francisco in the room
review.negativeRemarks: The Bed!
review.locationRemarks: Busy street,close to the airport

review.title: Everything you need to get a good night's rest
review.reviewText:
It was not a brand new facility, but nicely updated, and with all the amenities you needed: steam iron and ironing board, hair dryer, coffee maker, microwave and fridge. Our room was clean and facing the rear and quiet as a tomb.

We liked the waffles and the continental breakfast spread.

The shuttle from and to the airport was very convenient, allowing us to stay further away from the airport itself.
review.positiveRemarks: quiet room and complimentary airport shuttle service
review.locationRemarks: convenient and quiet for airport travelers without a car

review.title: Great Hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel is great value. The room is clean with nice breakfast. I will stay again.

review.title: great, remember: near airport
review.reviewText:
everything was fine except it took two times to flush the toilet. other than that, and the airport noise(which was expected), it was clean, roomy; the staff was especially helpful and attentive.
next door is a restaurant named don picos: superb. eat there.
review.negativeRemarks: took two times to flush toilet completely.
review.locationRemarks: warning: near airport.

review.title: Convenient for early AM flights out of SFO
review.reviewText: All the basics besides the obvious: microwave, internet access, fridge. And an easy shuttle ride to the airport, with a safe place to keep my car for the week I am gone. That was all I needed.
review.positiveRemarks: With a car, close proximity to needed restaurants and shopping
review.negativeRemarks: No pool, hot tub, gym.
review.locationRemarks: Not anywhere near the glamorous part of San Francisco that people come to see. On the most heavily trafficked, non-frreeway street in the Bay Area.

review.title: cheap hotel
review.reviewText: we needed an inexpensive place to stay late at night. This filled the bill.
review.negativeRemarks: did not like the shuttle service. served several properties.

review.title: Clean, comfortable stay while visiting SF
review.reviewText: This was one of the best lodging experiences i've had. The room was very comfotable and the size was big with a king bed. The amenities in the room was more than i expected, complete with even a microwave, fridge and coffee maker. The bathroom was of a smaller size but not a problem at all. The most important thing was that it felt clean and nice. The staff was very helpful and welcoming. If there were any improvements tha i would suggest, it would be that the breakfast area is a bit small and crowded. And the water pressure from the shower head could be stronger. But for the price you pay and the rest of the positive vibe, there's nothing more i could ask of this place.
review.negativeRemarks: None
review.locationRemarks: Close to freeway and to the city

review.title: 49er game trip
review.reviewText: When we arrived it was a little annoying the room wasn't ready. Check in was 2pm but wasn't ready until 2:35pm. We got over it pretty quickly. Room was great for the price. Also breakfast was surprisingly awesome! They even had fresh batter to make your own waffles!!We were also just 15 miles from downtown San Francisco. Overall great room/hotel/service and price!

review.title: Great place to stay
review.reviewText: I stayed here one night before and early flight. The room was well sized and clean. The furniture is nicer than a standard cheap motel and there is even a fridge and microwave. I was very pleased with this hotel considering the low price.
review.negativeRemarks: I missed the free breakfast lol
review.locationRemarks: SFO

review.title: Super 8 more Like Surprise 8 ! a Great Surprise
review.reviewText:
Nicely kept and really cool pictures inside of San Francisco, Very Clean,
Comes with Fridge, Micro Wave, Free Wi Fi free Breakfast, best Waffles I have ever had and it was free !!!! better than a restaurants waffles !!!!!
Most free Hotel Waffles are like rubber, Let them know they got one hell of a great batter mix for that waffle.
review.positiveRemarks: The Waffles, not cause they were free, they were unusually Great !!!!
review.negativeRemarks: nothing
review.locationRemarks: easy in and out, easy to get to the Airport !!!!!

review.title: clean, quiet, well furnished
review.reviewText: very clean and well furnished. an excellent value, would definitely stay here again for airport business.

review.title: Great value and nice.
review.reviewText: I will stay here again for sure. This hotel exceeded my expectations. I really liked how modern it feels and that it was very clean. I can't believe the value and what you get for what you are paying. Very nice hotel.

review.title: Close to SFO, free parking
review.reviewText: Location is ok, 15-20 minutes to Downtown or Golden Gate bridge area. Breakfast is quite poor.

review.title: great hotel and great deal
review.reviewText:
This is an older looking hotel that has modern amenities. Nice HD tv with 200 channels.
Our room had a jet tub and large comfortable bed. We didn't find anything at the free
breakfast that we liked so we just ate elsewhere. We found lots of great stores and
restaurants in the San Bruno / Daly city area. This hotel also has a shuttle service.

review.title: Convenient Location, Well-Maintained, a Good Value
review.reviewText:
This hotel is conveniently located near SFO airport. It's on a fairly busy street with many locally-owned restaurants. There's also a chain drugstore a few doors away, and slightly further in one direction there are grocery stores, and in the other direction: a large mall with a movie theater.

It's very easy to get on and off the 280.

Although on a busy street, my second-floor room facing that street was remarkably quiet.

My room was immaculate. It looked recently-decorated. Over the bad was a large old-time-y black-and-white photograph of San Francisco--just right for stimulating touristic feelings.

The plumbing worked well, as did the air conditioning. The fixtures seemed very new and did not suffer from the kind of problems big hotels sometimes have.

In short, I found this hotel convenient, comfortable, clean--and reasonably-priced.

review.title: Quick drive to airport
review.reviewText: Very convenient to airport with free shuttle service.
review.negativeRemarks: Just know you are not in the tourist area, which was fine at this point in the vacation.
review.locationRemarks: Great location for being near the airport

review.title: great stay for the price!
review.reviewText: For the price this was a really great stay. The room was clean and comfortable.

review.title: Great budget motel near the airport
review.reviewText: Great budget motel near the airport. It was ideal, as it was 10 minutes from the car rental place and breakfast is included in the price!

review.title: Clean & comfortable
review.reviewText: Friendly,helful staff. Clean & comfortable rooms.Excellent value!

review.title: Great for the Price!
review.reviewText: Nice hotel for the price. Comfortable bed. My only complaint was the very small eating area (little more than a hallway).

review.title: Good Experience
review.reviewText: The man at front desk was very helpful with area information & in directing us to the train service. The room was clean and in the morning we were able to store our baggage while securing our transportation. It was a good experience

review.title: Nicely updated
review.reviewText: This older hotel has had a really nice facelift to contemporary style and the beds were very comfortable. Our only complaint was that there is not enough room for breakfast guests and pretty much everything was carbs. But it was a really good stay.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast
review.locationRemarks: Not the best neighborhood in south San Francisco, but not horrible.

review.title: Ideal for airport but quiet
review.reviewText: Only stopped for one night and arrived late. Conveniently situated for the airport but quiet. Pleasing views from rear of hotel. Very pleased to find a fridge and a microwave in the room. Only slight critisizm - size of eating area could have been larger although it was possible to take breakfast to room and I appreciate this a motel not a hotel

review.title: Great hotel; nice proximity to the airport.
review.reviewText: The hotel checkin was easy and efficient; pleasant desk clerk. Our room was clean and well supplied with toiletry items. The beds were very comfortable and the pillows were PERFECT; a difficult thing to find in most hotels. Rooms were very quiet; AC worked great. No complaints; would stay here again.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast could have offered healthier choices.
review.locationRemarks: Great proximity to the airport and easy to get to.

review.title: Affordable comfort
review.reviewText: Cheap and convenient comfort. Great for a quick overnight stay.

review.title: Recommended
review.reviewText: Good service from staff. Nice facility. Good breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: Handy for SFO Airport

review.title: Great overnight stay
review.reviewText: Surprised by the motel - clean , comfortable. Feels more like holiday inn chain. Breakfast is basic, coffee is not very good. Free shuttle to the airport and there is Bart about 15 min walk - much cheaper rate to SF than from the airport. Would even consider it cheaper alternative stay to visit SF.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast

review.title: Great hotel by airport.
review.reviewText: Excellent, clean, convenient. Excellent Mexican restaurant next door. Make sure you call for the shuttle when arriving at airport.

review.title: Perfect with coffee shops nearby
review.reviewText: Quiet, clean and modern. I arrived after quite a series of flights and layovers from Italy and this place helped revive my spirits. I was originally concerned about noise from airplanes with the vicinity of the airport, but it wasn't an issue, or I was just so tired. Walking distance nearby you will find Starbucks and a local coffee shop and more downtown type shops. I wish the airport shuttle was 24 hours, a cab cost $20.
review.positiveRemarks: comfortable bed, sink outside bathroom, newer room
review.negativeRemarks: no 24 hour shuttle to airport
review.locationRemarks: coffee shops nearby

review.title: Convenient to airport and comfy
review.reviewText: Looking for convenience to airport for early flight; this is the place to stay. Clean and comfy. Hotel staff very helpful with directions. Off street parking great. Left before breakfast so can't comment on that. Overall very pleased.
review.negativeRemarks: Since many airport travellers use this, it would be nice if breakfast began around 5:00 am.
review.locationRemarks: Only a mile or so from large mall and many restaurants.

review.title: Great hotel for people of all ages
review.reviewText: To me, i love the life of luxury especially in hotels. I love the big cozy beds, the amazing showers, the complimentary breakfasts and the area. This place has all of it. I love the area because there is so many restaurants around, it is about a 10 min drive to SFO and about a 30 min drive to downtown. I would definitely stay there again!!!
review.negativeRemarks: It's hard to find the driveway to pull in.
review.locationRemarks: out of the hustle of the city, but still very close to it.

review.title: Nice Hotel, Nice stay
review.reviewText: Room was clean. Bed was comfortable. Staff was friendly and helpful. Maids did an excellent job cleaning.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the freeway. Close to the airport.

review.title: Pleasantly surprised
review.reviewText: We were pleasantly surprised with the hotel and accommodations. We would stay here again.

review.title: Good value...clean hotel for short stay.
review.reviewText: Nice for a Super 8. Seems to have been renovated. We had a very large room (almost too much space for just 2 of us). But, the room was clean. Lobby offered use of computer and printer. Staff was very friendly and helpful. On a somewhat busy (not sure about safe) street. Good for a short stay. I'm very sensitive to noise and I didn't really hear any traffic or other hotel guests (the air conditioner blowing also helped block out any of that noise). Price was good - great value for what we needed which was just a quick stay before our trip up farther north. Not sure I'd recommend this hotel for a longer trip...little bit of a distance into San Fran.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff were very very very helpful and friendly!
review.locationRemarks: Didn't feel completely safe in this neighborhood, but parking lot is off the main road a little and we had no issues.

review.title: San Bruno Super 8
review.reviewText: Receptionist very helpful. Shuttle wonderful to and from airport. Nearby restaurants in downtown San Bruno.
review.negativeRemarks: Lifts and foyer run down. Breakfast solid sugar and carbs..!
review.locationRemarks: OK

review.title: Good value for money
review.reviewText: We found this hotel of equal standard or higher than most of the hotels we stayed at on our trip. The linen looked classy and clean, the room had a refridgerator, hairdryer, internet access, and free parking. There was lashings of hot water and lots of towels. We were greeted by friendly helpful staff and the whole experience was very pleasant.
review.positiveRemarks: Appearance and space of bedroom. Proximityto airport
review.negativeRemarks: Whilst it was in a good location for the airport, it was not the best of areas
review.locationRemarks: Very good for airport location

review.title: Great hotel, Great Price
review.reviewText: Great hotel and great price. This hotel is two miles from the airport and very close to car rental return. The rooms are lovely and it is easy to get to. One of the nicest Super 8's you can find. This was my third trip there.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport

review.title: Clean, simple, convenient.
review.reviewText: This is a bargain-priced and older property, but is clean and well maintained. Staff was friendly and helpful. Location is within 5 minutes of SFO, so perfect stopping point before early morning or after late night flight. There are some nice restaurants within walking distance and multiple "room service" options (via outside companies) available.
review.locationRemarks: Five minutes from SFO

review.title: not bad
review.reviewText: Not bad for the rate. Walking distance to great restaurants.

review.title: Pleasantly surprised
review.reviewText: This hotel was a little old and could do with an update but it was very comfortable and great value for money. The guest laundry was a little too expensive compared with other places we stayed. For a hotel right next to the airport it was surprisingly quiet, had heaps of free parking, free wifi, free breakfast and comfy beds. I would stay there again
review.negativeRemarks: The front desk staff seemed a little disinterested.
review.locationRemarks: 2 miles from the airport but also right near a shopping centre if you have some last minute shopping to do.

review.title: I would recommend
review.reviewText: Great location. Friendly and clean. Thoroughly enjoyed it.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing
review.locationRemarks: Close to airport and short ride to SF Bay

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Nice Hotel to stay one or two nights. We have no problems checking in, and the breakfast is good (you can prepare your own waffles).
review.locationRemarks: Good location near the aiport

review.title: Super 8 Good San Bruno Good experience
review.reviewText: Room was clean, staff friendly, good continental breakfast, free shuttle to the airport, rates were good, we're staying there again soon, would definitely recommend.

review.title: Good place to rest before or after a overseas flig
review.reviewText: Great Mexican food right next door, and a Wendys just up the street. Lots of other places to eat. About 15 minutes to airport and they have a shuttle that runs on the 1/2 hour. Just call them when you arrive and they will come get you. Also they are on the call box outside where you wait, there is a phone that will call them. Great place.
review.positiveRemarks: Good mex rest right next door
review.negativeRemarks: all good
review.locationRemarks: good near lots of things, I even walked to Well Fargo bank,

review.title: Airport San Francisco
review.reviewText: It is a good place for this price to stay next to the airport.

review.title: Def stay again
review.reviewText: For the price and location of this hotel it's great. We stayed here before our flight home to England. It's near the airport and near the Bart train into San fran city
review.locationRemarks: San fran airport

review.title: Great!
review.reviewText: Perfect for an overnight stay after a flight. Breakfast room was a little cramped, but the waffle iron made up for that!
review.negativeRemarks: Size of breakfast area
review.locationRemarks: Excellent

review.title: Flying into and out of SFO International Airport
review.reviewText: Shuttle to and from SFO airport was very convenient
review.negativeRemarks: lack of trolly to transport baggage at 5 AM
review.locationRemarks: very convenient to airport

review.title: Great Value
review.reviewText:
This hotel was a great value. The rooms were all recently renovated and looked very nice. The bathroom left a little to be desired (seems like they may have skimped there on the renovations), but for the price, you can't beat it.

The elevator broke down the day before leaving which was quite unpleasant having to lug all of our luggage down 3 flights of stairs and through the rain (as the stairs are on the outside, not on the inside of the building. They are also labeled as an 'emergency exit only'), but that could happen at any hotel, so I can't fault the hotel for that.

The staff was a bit hit or miss. Some of the front desk staff was extremely pleasant while others were just 'ok'. But again, that could happen anywhere, and I'll give them the benefit of the doubt that it was just a bad day on those staff member's parts.

The location is great. You're only a minutes drive from the interstate and El Camino Real has just about everything you could possibly need, including a walgreens a block down, and a Wendy's right next door practically in case you need to grab a quick bite to eat. There is also a huge shopping district just past the interstate that has a Target, cinema and lots of restaurants.

All in all I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone, and I would gladly stay here again next time I am in the San Fran area.
review.positiveRemarks: Updated room decor. All of the rooms look really nice. The beds are comfy, the air works great, flat screen TV, free breakfast.
review.negativeRemarks: The bathroom has not been updated and looks a bit outdated.
review.locationRemarks: Great location! Close to the interstate giving it easy access to anything in SF.

review.title: quick stay
review.reviewText: easy access - very plesant folks running it. Easy shuttle to and from airport - comfortable bed!

review.title: Great for using as an airport hotel
review.reviewText: Hotel is nothing fancy but is a reasonable option for an airport hotel or short stay. Breakfast is light but a nice touch in an expensive travel city like San Francisco
review.negativeRemarks: Rooms a little dated and basic
review.locationRemarks: Close to airport but not much else.

review.title: Not bad for a short stay
review.reviewText: We stayed here for one night because 1) it offers free shuttle service to SFO, 2) free wireless internet connection, and 3) the price was pretty reasonable. Did not have breakfast there, so don't know how it is. Overall, the stay was not bad (we knew it's a Super 8, so our expectation was not high). One good thing was that it was pretty quiet during the night.

review.title: Spring break
review.reviewText: Close to the airport. Convenient location between San Francisco and Monterey Ample parking. Good continental breakfast to get your day started. Easy freeway access to north and south routes.
review.negativeRemarks: Lumpy pillow

review.title: Would highly recommend this place
review.reviewText: We have stayed at this hotel several times when we have early flights out of the SF international airport. The beds are comfortable the rooms are very clean and quite. They have a great shuttle, and it is always clean, safe and a very nice breakfast. You just can't beat the price.
review.positiveRemarks: The breakfast. Hot waffles, cereal, bagels , coffee and milk. Only thing missing was peanut butter.
review.negativeRemarks: took forever for the hot water to heat up in the shower and the tub stopper did not work so no bath.
review.locationRemarks: easy to find

review.title: Good Value
review.reviewText: Loved the free shuttle to and from the airport and the make your own waffles, for breakfast, in the morning.
review.positiveRemarks: Make your own waffles and free airport shuttle
review.locationRemarks: Next to Wendy's and a Mexican Restaurant

review.title: Happy business traveler
review.reviewText:
Well-located reasonably priced hotel near San Francisco airport. Plenty of places to eat near by, easy access to Highway 101, clean & quiet neighborhood. Staff is very welcoming and always ready to help. Free parking in connected lot, free breakfast, and free wireless internet connection. Most rooms have a microwave and refrig.
Great place to stay while on business or pleasure. I stay here every six months and will continue to do so. Forget about the high priced hotels near SFO, this is the place to stay, but save me a room!
review.positiveRemarks: Good location, restaurants, & free wireless connection
review.negativeRemarks: none
review.locationRemarks: Easy access to SFO and highways

review.title: Nice and quiet
review.reviewText: Perfectly good room; near BART station, and also close to airport.Plenty of restuarants nearby, so I do recommend it.

review.title: Great for the price and convenience!
review.reviewText: Great hotel for the price and convenience to the airport. Also easily accessible to downtown San Francisco. Very helpful and friendly staff, free parking. While bed wasn't plush, it was comfortable. Only negative at all was the very firm and thick foam pillows.
review.negativeRemarks: pillows
review.locationRemarks: Conveniently located on El Camino just a few miles from SFO airport

review.title: Super 8 is Super
review.reviewText: Everything was ok. It has a lot of benefits like the breakfast, microwave, refrigerator,no noisy place and the laundry.

review.title: Great Hotel for the price
review.reviewText: Great hotel for the price. I don't expect much when I go to a Super 8 but the staff was friendly. They let me check in a little early. Room was clean and the hotel was quiet. I was there for one night for an interview. I would definitely go back.

review.title: Overall a good stay
review.reviewText: We had a pleasant check-in. The staff we encountered were very polite. Our rooms were average and slightly worn and outdated but comfortable. The continental breakfast was excellent. We did have a problem with our bathtub drain. It was a very conveniant location to the airport. We enjoyed our stay
review.negativeRemarks: plugged tub drain
review.locationRemarks: conveniant to the airport

review.title: Good hotel!
review.reviewText: Overall, we were very satisfied with this hotel. It was clean, comfortable and quiet. Also, it was nice that it was so close to San Francisco!

review.title: Short but sweet stay!
review.reviewText: Called ahead to make sure they knew I was a late arrival. Room was ready and waiting at 2 am as promised. Only drawback is parking is very tight. Didn't eat at breakfast so no idea how it was. Close to airport and freeway access.
review.negativeRemarks: Parking is tight

review.title: Best Hotel for the Price!!!
review.reviewText: I ha dnever stayed in a Super 8 before, but I have always considered them to be cheap motels. So I had very low expectations for this place. But I was blown away when I got to the room. The furniture and decor were very modern looking. There was a flat screen LCD with DirecTV. There was a mini-fridge (not the typical micro-fridge as seen in other hotels) and a microwave. The bathroom was large with a curved shower rod and a nice selectable shower head. The water pressure was a little light, but I attribute that the city water system. To top it off, they had a waffle maker at breakfast. I was just very impressed with the whole experience. My wife and I stayed at 4 hotels on our trip up the central coast, and this one was second only to the much more expensive Embassy Suites.
review.positiveRemarks: The room was large, the bed was comfortable, and there was a waffle maker at breakfast.
review.negativeRemarks: The parking lot was a little tight and it was difficult to pull onto the very busy road.
review.locationRemarks: It is right off of a main road. If you miss the turn into the parking, you'll have to go around the block.

review.title: Comfortable and clean!
review.reviewText: I was surprised by the quality of this hotel. The bed was comfortable, the sheets were clean and felt like actual sheets rather than paper, the TV selection was way better than most hotels seem to offer, the room had plenty of space, and they offered free, prompt shuttle service to the airport. The internet connection was annoying, as it kept making me sign back in every 10-15 minutes, but when it worked it was at a speed fast enough to watch streaming internet shows. Not only that, it was located within walking distance to a pretty decent sit down mexican restaurant. I would definitely stay at this Super 8 again the next time I catch a flight out of SFO!
review.negativeRemarks: Internet server required me to sign back in frequently
review.locationRemarks: About 10 minutes from SFO

review.title: Would recommend
review.reviewText: Close to the airport, stayed briefly for the night - did not encounter any issues. Would recommend.

review.title: Not so Super 8
review.reviewText: Chose it based on reviews. Would not stay there again. Not very clean, uncomfortable beds and poor service. The hotel is right next to the road, and during night you can hear people walking past along with traffic. It is also south of the airport in San Bruno area, so if you want to be close to San Francisco downtown, this is not your pick.
review.positiveRemarks: There was a fairly new, descent size flat screen tv in the room.
review.negativeRemarks: Service and location.
review.locationRemarks: Roadside San Bruno, south of the airport and about 30-40 mins south of San Fran downtown.

review.title: Great Hotel
review.reviewText: Great hotel, always clean and close to the airport and car rewntal return.
review.negativeRemarks: Small breakfast room.
review.locationRemarks: Great Location

review.title: Stay here if you go to San Francisco
review.reviewText: Stayed for 2 days in San Fran. The staff was very friendly. The room, while small, is well furnished with coffee maker, hair drier, microwave, even a small fridge and free Wifi! Continental breakfast has milk, cereal, yogurt, banana, waffle maker (YAY!), and some other choices. The staff was quick to bring out more waffle supply when it ran out. While the hotel is about 30 minutes south of San Francisco, it is well worth my recommendation, especially for the low price that they charge. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
review.negativeRemarks: Small size
review.locationRemarks: Located on a quiet highway, 30 minutes south of San Francisco, ample of parking spots.

review.title: Super 8 San Bruno
review.reviewText: The only negative was that we could not stay connected to the Internet. We had to log back in every five minutes. Very irritating. The room was comfortable, clean, and quiet. The shuttle was on time. They need to make it clear that shuttle transportation from the airport needs to be arranged. They do not just drive by the airport like other shuttle vans. Walking distance to several restaurants.

review.title: Clean room and good connection to San Francisco
review.reviewText: Great Super 8, shuttle bus and good breakfast (banana, apple, yoghurt), clean and quiet room, very big. Looks more as a hotel than a motel.

review.title: Not bad, close to airport for travellers.
review.reviewText:
Pretty good hotel, close to airport.

Long taxi ride into SF and Bay area, so you'll need a car. Self parking at hotel is good.

Room was old, but clean and comfortable.

Only down side was that the hot water was not working when we arrived and when we asked at reception, they told us we must be wrong because no-one else had complained. Poor customer service; but we worked out for ourselves that the water had to run for abour 10minutes before it got hot. After that it wasn't a problem, so I think the room just hadn't been used in a few days and the line needed flushing.
review.positiveRemarks: Included contintenal breakfast was convenient and filling.
review.negativeRemarks: Customer service.
review.locationRemarks: Good location to the airport, some distance to SF and Bay area.

review.title: definately the same motel~
review.reviewText: Over all are great hotel who has a car to travel to SF...breakfast..wife...parking...and the staff are superb!!!!2 tumbs up!

review.title: Location is not very good. Quality so-so.
review.reviewText: Only good thing about this hotel was a price. If you need a very short sleepover - it will do...

review.title: Great, Super 8
review.reviewText: Traveling through SFO and needed a decent place to stay between flights. Found this gem on the internet, and was glad I did. Price of the night's stay and the hotel's proximity to the airport were 2 great pluses for me. The hotel was comfortable and well maintained, and the staff was friendly and helpful. The shuttle service to and from the airport made my day! As well, the great room updates helped make my stay a good experience.
review.locationRemarks: N/A

review.title: Better than expected!
review.reviewText: Super 8 San Bruno/San Francisco Airport turned out to be a great choice for us. Although, it was a little extra to drive into the city on Friday to the SF Auto Show, we enjoyed our stay in the area. Also, we appreciate the extra effort to get our TV working by the front desk gal on Thanksgiving night. We'd stay here again. Also, parking was free (huge selling point).
review.locationRemarks: South San Francisco and SFO / Airport area is one of our favorite places. Love driving along El Camino Real from San Mateo on up to SSF.

review.title: Excellent Value
review.reviewText: Very comfy room at a great price. Close to the Airport with free shuttle. 10 minute drive to downtown. Free breakfast. Would stay there agaian.

review.title: good
review.reviewText: good

review.title: clean and friendly
review.reviewText: This location was very close to all areas of San Fransico and Oakland by car .Easy in and out no problems parking. Rooms were very clean and it felt really safe for a budget room.

review.title: Good airport hotel at a reasonable price
review.reviewText:
The Super 8 Hotel at St Bruno is about 15 minutes away from SFO- using the complimentary airport transfer.
We stayed for only one night on our way back to London.

The receptionist was pleasant and welcoming and the room, though not large, was more than adequate for an overnight stop. It was clean and comfortable.
We didn't eat out however there were a number of eateries in the vicinity.
The breakfast was simple but more than adequate- the only downside was that the breakfast room was rather small for the number using it at the time we were there. Some people were taking their breakfasts back to their rooms.

review.title: Best airport hotel
review.reviewText: Comfortable hotel that is close to the airport. I will definitely stay there again.

review.title: Much Better
review.reviewText: I stayed here on business. It was much nicer than the similarly priced hotel I stayed in last year. It is only a short drive to several stores and restaurants. I would recommend it to anyone wanting a decent, moderately priced hotel.

review.title: Great location right near San Fran Airport!
review.reviewText: This was one of the nicest Super 8s we've stayed at -- Great parking, great wi-fi, and the hotel walls were painted the prettiest shade of blue! The temperature was just right in our room, and check in/out was convenient. Breakfast was alright, but the room was really cramped so we took our food back to our room. Guest laundry was quite expensive, but then again what isn't in San Francisco?! All in all, we'd stay again if we were in the area again.

review.title: nice hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel room is comfortable and clean. The king size bed, pillows and covers are comfortable and in good condition. Housekeeping staff is very friendly and did greart job. The location is easily accessible to different shopping plazas, nice restaurants and highway. The only thing to be improved is the bathroom. The toilet is very loud when flushing since the water pressure is extremely high. (like those in airplane). Also the lighting in the bathroom is not bright enough.

review.title: Great hotel for an overnight airport stay
review.reviewText: Its a simple airport hotel. Only 3 miles from terminal, with an efficient FREE transfer service and comfortable rooms. The breakfast is a bonus as long as you don't expect too much, the WiFi is free and there's a free daily paper too. If you buy at the right price it can't be bad!

review.title: Nice comfortable hotel in a great location
review.reviewText: Room was very comfortable and well appointed for the price. We were surprised and pleased included a microwave and refrigerator for this price. The staff were very friendly and helpful for any requests. I would definitely recommend it for quiet comfortable place to stay near the airport.

review.title: Good value and handy for airport
review.reviewText:
Good value hotel clean and comfortable.

It looked as though our room had recently been redecorated.

review.title: comfortable
review.reviewText: This hotel is very close to the airport and I only heard 2 planes while we were there. We checked in really late Sunday night and the front clerk was very friendly. The room was comfortable, the pictures are much brighter and cleaner than the place really is, but all in all it was good. The breakfast area was tiny and 3 people made it crowded. Breakfast is 6-9 and we went at 8 and had to ask for things to be refilled. Not much to offer, but it was still free. Would stay again.

review.title: A basic place
review.reviewText: Stayed for only a few hours due to flight change. A basic place....did not make use of any services....looks like there was a shuttle to SFO, but did not use it. Was a bit farther from the airport than I thought it would be

review.title: Okay hotel
review.reviewText: Hotel was clean, comfortable and convenient to the airport. We stayed three nights and would have enjoyed having some gym facilities. Complimentary parking and WIFI were appreciated. Staff were friendly and courteous. Good coffee and hot DIY waffles for breakfast were a good way to start the day.

review.title: very nice hotel, and good location, as we choose it for nearby the airport
review.reviewText: good location, nice room, friendly serive

review.title: served its purpose
review.reviewText: This hotel was just a place for us to crash before heading out from the SF airport. We really had no expectations, however, we were very pleased with the hotel overall and would stay again.

review.title: Older hotel but upkept well.
review.reviewText:
This is the second time we have stayed at this hotel and both times have found it clean and comfortable. Despite it being an older hotel, it is being well upkept and appeared to have been refurbished since the last time we stayed. The breakfast was very good but the lack of room in the breakfast room let it down - the hotel was busy but there were only 4 or 5 small tables to eat breakfast at. The reception staff were very helpful and friendly.
The hotel is convenient to the airport but quite a way out of the city - trains were convenient though.
I would recommend this hotel as for the price it was great.

review.title: Very impressed
review.reviewText:
Over our 2 months in the United States we stayed at various Motel 8's and were very impressed with the friendliness and efficency of your staff. Everyone was very helpful. We Would certainly recommend your chain to people travelling in the USA.

The motel in Scotts Bluff Nebraska was exceptional.

review.title: Great hotel for the price!
review.reviewText: A great hotel and only about 20mins away from central San Fransisco. I would definitely stay there again if I was travelling to San Fransisco. We were there for 6 nights, and was perfect for sight seeing in San Fransisco.

review.title: clean with fast wifi and competent service
review.reviewText: For a basic airport hotel this is pretty good. The wifi was free and fast, the room large and basic. Staff (the Patels) are competent and friendly. There's a continental breakfast 6-9am (you can take food back to the room) and a coffee machine in the room. There's a free shuttle which runs every 30 min during the day and (perhaps?) less often at night. If you don't want to wait (and I didn't) a cab from SFO will cost about $18. None of these SFO airport hotels are right close by the airport, it took say 10 minutes to get there by cab.

review.title: A nice hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel is very convenient and the staffs are friendly.

review.title: Highly recommand!
review.reviewText:
good location, just 10 min driving from SF Int'l airport (They also have shuttle)
good rate, very friendly service, clean room, and good breakfast!

review.title: Very Good Value
review.reviewText: Stayed two nights. Very convenient for SFO and BART into central San Fransisco (receptionist suggested we use the free shuttle to the airport to get to a BART station but drove to nearby San Bruno). Room clean and comforatable. Good neighbourhood. Breakfast good though very crowded small area so had to take back to room which wasn't a problem. Only negatives were the rollaway bed wasn't very comforable and only just fiited in the room. Air conditioning was a liitle difficult to set correctly.

review.title: Perfect location
review.reviewText:
We were visiting San Francisco and stayed at Super 8 in San Bruno. We did not rent a car. We walked a few blocks, about 5 minutes to the CalTrain station and took the train into San Francisco each day. The train was only $5 per person for a full day pass, and the train ride was about 20 minutes each direction.

There were plenty of places to get food near the hotel, including several places that deliver to your room. There are also plenty of stores to get vacation essentials nearby.

Staff was extremely friendly and helpful, the room was very bright and clean with HDTV and tons of satellite channels (Dish Network).

The hotel was very quiet, which was perfect for getting a good nights sleep.

Free shuttle from SFO airport, and free breakfast each day.

review.title: Misleading Photos
review.reviewText: The photos of this hotel are extremely misleading. The breakfast bar is extremely small and sparse, and the hotel is very run down and old.

review.title: Good value, good motel
review.reviewText: Convenient location. Good service and room considering the price we pay. The room is clean and spacious. Free breakfast, internet, and shuttle to the airport. The bed is very comfortable.

review.title: Very pleasantly surprised!
review.reviewText: I have stayed at other Super 8 Hotels before, and have stayed at many airport area hotels, so I honestly didn't expect much. The hotel was very clean, seemed recently remodeled, easy check-in, tight but safe parking lot, IHOP down the street for 24 hour food, and close to the airport. Room was immaculate, and bed was EXTREMELY comfortable. I would highly recommend this hotel.

review.title: great stay for great price
review.reviewText: Super comfy beds, clean room, friendly service, very convenient to the airport and the free shuttle was prompt. Great value for money.

review.title: Great Quality
review.reviewText: If you are on a tight budget I would recommend this hotel. I had read the reviews and decided to give it a try even if I usually go to higher end hotel. I was really please with my stay. The rooms was clean and good size. It was nice to have breakfast included. I used their shuttle service and did not have any problem. The Caltrain station is less than 10min walk from the hotel. It was really quiet which was nice. Overall there is no need to pay more this hotel provides great quality for a lower price.

review.title: Will stay again
review.reviewText: A very pleasant stay at this motel. We spent six nights here and I can not say anything negative about our stay. A great bargain for the price we payed.

review.title: Nice Hotel for a Few Nights
review.reviewText: Good location, close to the airport. Had a slight smell in the hallway, but liked the modern look and updates. Great for a short stay.

review.title: Great place to stay
review.reviewText: This is my third trip to this hotel. It is convient to the airport and also to car rental return. I stayed here the first time because of the good reviews. I was not disappointed. It is clean and quiet. A very nice place to stay.

review.title: Great Value for the price
review.reviewText: We spent one night here in April as we had a filight next morning from SFO. The location is obviously great. Given the price of about 60 a night..this palce is a great value for money...the rooms were spacious, staff was friendly, parking is free, rooms ahve a fridge and a microwave, free internet, ironing board, desk, FREE breakfast etc...i mention all this because i struggled to find all this even in pricier hotels during my stay in California and Vegas. I definately recommed it if you have a night or so to spend and need to be clsoe to the airport. Not exactly a family stay kind of place or for a longer stay..but great for business travellers or for those who are ona budget.

review.title: Cheap Close and Comfortable what else could you want?
review.reviewText: We got to the hotel around 1:00 AM. The hotel manager was very pleasant and helpful. The room was clean and the bed was quite comfortable. Breakfast in the morning was bagels, mini muffins, cold cereal, fruit, coffee, and juice.

review.title: perfectly acceptable
review.reviewText: Nothing special but fine for the price. Shuttle was convenient and there was a computer in the lobby where we could check our email. Will go back anytime.

review.title: Great!
review.reviewText:
If you expect upper class service, doormen, limos etc... go elsewhere.
If you expect a clean room, courteous employees and an overall great stay at a reasonable price, this is the place.

review.title: WOW! Super Impressed!
review.reviewText: Excellent customer service. Huge room that had been recently re-modeled. Comfortable bed. Ask for a room on the backside, facing the parking lot, as it is very quiet, and not facing the main road. Very convienent to the airport, and places to eat and shop.

review.title: good deal for an airport stay
review.reviewText: nothing fancy, just a clean and comfortable place to rest your weary bones if you are in the sfo or mid-peninsula region for a night or two (at most). quick ride on shuttle to airport.

review.title: Good value, location and comfort
review.reviewText: Staff was courteous and helpful--came right up to teach us how to use new satellite TV. We stayed 6 nights while on family visit and appreciated the spacious room with 2 comfortable chairs and enough drawers to unpack completely. Room was quiet, heat was dependable and held consistent temperature. Hallways and rooms recently renovated and nicely decorated. Great bed. Breakfast was basic but adequate. Breakfast room and lobby a little cramped. Water in shower was very hard and sometimes took a long time to warm up, but these are minor issues considering all the good things and the very reasonable price. Location is great with a drug store and many ethnic restaurants in easy walking distance. Only minutes from the airport and an easy drive to the city. This was our 3rd stay here in the last 18 months and it has been better each time. Highly recommended.

review.title: Good Location
review.reviewText:
There are stores and places to eat near by. Airport pick-up was efficient, the shuttle came by in about 10 minutes after I called. The morning shuttle was prompt at 5 a.m. The room was nice, clean, recently remodeled.

I have stayed here twice already, and would stay again.

review.title: Friendly, clean, quiet, exactly what I needed.
review.reviewText: It's perfect for a good sleep between two flights.

review.title: Impressed
review.reviewText:
This is a very good hotel, as compared with the other one I lived around Union Square in San Francisco. The room is well-furnitured and very clean, the staffs are kind and friendly, the breakfast is nice, the free internet wifi is pretty fast, and the free shuttle to the airport is convenient...
The only flaw is the rareness of restaurant, anyway, I'm impressed by this smart hotel and may come back the next time.

review.title: good quality service
review.reviewText: Newly renovated hotel. Comfortable bed. Food choices for in-room service.

review.title: Great Hotel for the $$$
review.reviewText: Clean comfortable and close to the Airport.

review.title: A great value close to SFO
review.reviewText: Clean spacious room with king size bed and satellite TV; 5 minutes from SFO airport. Very convenient the night before you fly out. A great value for the price.

review.title: Very nice stay
review.reviewText: The room was very clean, comfotable and surprisingly quiet even though we were on the street side. Once the window was shut you couldnt hear any traffic or adjoining noise. Good parking,decent breakfast,and cordial desk help.I'd stay again.

review.title: Good value
review.reviewText:
Clean comfortable room. Quiet and also nice parking.

A/C was a little hard to figure out since thermostat on wall did not controll anything!

Breakfast was meager.

review.title: Great Family Hotel
review.reviewText: Good location for a family trip to San Francisco. IHOP down the street was great choice with children. Room was clean and comfortable.

review.title: Exceeded Expectations
review.reviewText: We expected the place to be decent because it received very good recommendations in the visitors's comments. They were accurate. Place was recently refurbished -- simple but comfortable, staff was friendly & helpful, and it and was within walking distance of a variety of very good, ethnic restaurants. Also convenient to the airport with a free shuttle.

review.title: "small and friendly"
review.reviewText: Stayed 2 nights at the hotel. short personal trip. NIce, friendly hotel. good breakfast. coffe and hot water/tea is available 24 hours. Stuff very helpful.

review.title: Super 8 San Bruno is Super!
review.reviewText: We arrived after midnight at the wrong hotel instead of at the Super 8. After a phone call to Expedia and a call to the Super 8, the hotel clerk dispatched the shuttle to pick us up and bring us to right place. Check in was easy, and the room was clean and ready for us. The room was a little on the smallish side for a family of 4, but not a problem. In fact, we even considered coming back at the end of trip because we liked the place and the location so much, but decided (for unrelated reasons) to not change our plans. Overall, a very nice place and possibly the best rates in the area for such nice accommodations. Good breakfast and friendly staff, too.

review.title: Great Value, Helpful Staff
review.reviewText:
The room was new and clean and hotel staff were friendly and helpful. The wireless internet access in my room (on the first floor near the front desk) was strong and reliable. The king size bed was new and very comfortable. The mini fridge and microwave in the room came in handy, and the complimentary breakfast was ok - coffee, tea, juice, bread & bagels with toaster, fresh whole fruit, instant oatmeal, etc... - and the dining area was small but very clean.
The location of this motel was better than most around the airport with a Walgreens and a variety of small restaurants to choose from within walking distance. The parking lot was well-lit and easy to access near the lobby.
This was a great value for the price and I would definitely stay here again.

review.title: Better than expected
review.reviewText: This hotel was what I had hoped for re: location, cleanliness, and service. The morning breakfast was just OK.

review.title: Nice hotel, close to the Airport, good help!
review.reviewText:
We were looking for a place to watch the semi final of the World Cup.
We arrived very early (10.45 am) and asked if we could watch the game in the lobby untill we could check-in. The manager gave us a room instead. Fantastic service 5 star service !

Nice motel, good beds, good price.

review.title: Basic amenities... Great bed
review.reviewText: It was an inexpensive motel that provided the basic amenities and a fabulous, fabulous bed. The neighborhood was decent. There were a lot of cool, hole-in-the-wall restaurants that were close. Free internet.

review.title: Great Hotel for Transition time in SF
review.reviewText: The purpose of my stay in the SF area was to visit the city while waiting for my flight connection (22 hours). The hotel was inexpensive and very convenient for this purpose. The shuttle bus from the airport (provided by hotel) was shared with other hotels but Super 8 is first on the drop off list so very convenient! The front desk staff were very courteous and informative (assisting me in transitioning to city - 12 miles away). The room was large and clean. The complimentary breakfast was varied and acceptable to start my day with (coffed was high quality and the pasteries were fresh). The amenities of the hotel are slim, but the cost would reflect this. I stayed for a specific purpose and it superbly fulfilled the purpose.

review.title: Will Use Again
review.reviewText: Nice, well located little property. Bed was comfortable, room clean, staff very helpful. Will use it again for certain.

review.title: Typical Super 8: Clean, cheap, nice people
review.reviewText:
I stay here regularly. Rooms are VERY large, hotel is convenient to airports and restaurants. There is an IHOP about 2 blocks down the street. But no amenities - the free breakfast is very basic. So this is a place to sleep. They have many cable TV channels and nice TV. Very reliable wireless. Ample parking. Easy access to freeway.
KEEP IN MIND: The shuttle departing to the airport is free, but you have to request it the night before you are leaving.

review.title: Would go back.
review.reviewText: The staff was very helpful. The rooms are clean although not luxurious. Good accommodation for the price. We liked the fact that it was only 10 minutes to the SFO airport. Close to Caltrain station.

review.title: a very nice hotel
review.reviewText: very clean + quiet rooms, very friendly frontdesk, good breakfast, wireless internet ok. parking lot ok, airport shuttle ok, close to tanforan mall and all reasonably priced. would definately recommed to everyone. i will be back !

review.title: Excellent all-round motel choice
review.reviewText: This motel was exceptional. The manager was extremely helpful and friendly and couldn't do enough to meet our requirements. The motel was located in an extremely convenient position, not only for the San Francisco airport but also for transport into the city (BART, CalTrans). The room was very well apointed, clean and comfortable. There is a complimentary buffet breakfast available every morning between 6 am and 9am that made an excellent start to the day. Parking was also complimentary, secure and very convenient. If you are looking for shopping/dining the mall is only 20 minutes walk away and BJ's Restaurant and Brewhouse is well worth a visit.

review.title: Clean and Practical
review.reviewText: Cheap, clean and comfortable.

review.title: Perfect for our Purpose
review.reviewText: My wife and I were traveling from Atlanta to Tokyo and wanted a nice comfortable place to spend the night near the airport. This motel had one of the highest customer ratings of hotels that we considered, even those charging two and three times the price as this hotel, and we booked it based on customer reviews, not the number of stars. It only had a two star rating, but the customer ratings were higher than most three star hotels and many 4 star hotels. Only one minor negative -When we checked in there was a smell, but it was like it was a smell from a cleaner, and we did not notice it again after about 30 seconds. The room was very clean, up to date, and the bed was as comfortable as any bed that I have slept on away from my home. There were several eating places within an easy walking distance. The hotel staff were very helpful. The manager even recommended a motel close to Fisherman's Wharf for our extended stay that we had planned after returning from Japan. Because it is owned by the same people that own this Super 8 Motel, we booked 4 nights there. We were able to do this using the computer and printer provided at the hotel. For our purposes, this hotel was just what we were looking for.

review.title: Great place if close to the SFO Airport...Basic and Clean.
review.reviewText: The hotel was clean, the staff was polite and very nice. I checked in late due to a late flight. I had to call to get the shuttle to come pick me up from the airport, but it showed up within half an hour of getting to the airport. The continental breakfast was very very basic, but was good enough. The room was a good size and very clean, as was the bathroom. Overall a good, pleasant stay.

review.title: good
review.reviewText: would stay there again. good customer service

review.title: Very friendly, helpful staff
review.reviewText: This is a great value. Not a lot of amenities, but we were very satisfied with the room and particularly with the staff at the front desk. They were warm and friendly and very helpful. We would definitely stay here again.

review.title: Easy to find, centrally located
review.reviewText: The hotel was clean, all the basic items were there - iron, ironing board, coffee maker, refrigerator. It was a comfortable, pleasant room.

review.title: Good cheap room for a short night's sleep
review.reviewText: I was only going to be at the hotel for a short while before I headed to the airport. This was a good place to stay that was resonably priced.

review.title: Good place to stay close to SFO
review.reviewText: We flew in to SFO late from Europe on different flights and were afraid winter weather might complicate arrivals. So we booked 2 rooms and were happy to be able to sleep on comfortable, quiet beds after a transatlantic flight. Because of a previous review, I knew to call for the shuttle, and once we did, they only took about 15 minutes to come. The hotel is nothing fancy, but very clean, comfortable, and quiet. The breakfast is workable, but we had time to walk to IHOP down the street. It's a great value for what we paid.

review.title: For the price, I wasnt expecting much. I was wrong.
review.reviewText: I really thought that this would be a motel where all the fittings were old and broken and mould in every corner. I was so wrong. We arrived a little bit before "official" check in, yet were given our rooms straight away. They booked us in for the free Airport Shuttle the next morning too. The room was perfectly servicable. More space than I have had in pricer motels. Cable tv, hairdryer, coffee maker, paper cups and plastic glasses, shampoo and soap all provided. The carpet was clean and the bathroom spotless. There was a drink (soda) machine and ice maker on the ground floor and a snack food vending machine inside the kitchen. Staff including the cleaning lady were very nice. When I return to SF, I will be seeking this motel out again for a longer stay!!!

review.title: Convenient location for airport
review.reviewText: Hotel was easy to find. Many good restaurants in walking distance. Close to airport. Friendly hotel staff, secure parking, and clean rooms. Would return again.

review.title: good for one night at beginning/end of trip
review.reviewText: A good hotel for a first night after flights because of proximity to airport. Room was clean, warm, comfortable and quiet. Breakfast gave lots of choice - cereals, juice, muffins, pastries, toast, fruit... location would also be good for a budget alternative to staying in downtown San Francisco because it is close to commuter links into the city. A good budget choice (even with 17 year old twins sharing our room!)

review.title: So-so
review.reviewText: The hotel is near to airport, but it's so far from the center. It isn't good. The staff so nice, but the room is not clean enough.

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel was actually a nice place for the location where it was at. The room was clean and it also had a hot tub. The only dissapointment was the hot tub did not work properly! Overall was very satisfied with my stay!

review.title: The best hotel considering price
review.reviewText: The staffs were really nice. (The nicest staffs ever) They always checked out whether food was enough for breakfast. The driver for shuttle moved all my baggages for me. The person in the counter was very nice. The condition of the room was similar to the other two star hotels.

review.title: Not bad
review.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised to find a large jacuzzi tub in the room considering that I didn't request it. Unfortunately the jets never worked. The room was clean and the hotel staff was nice. The bed isn't very comfortable but overall the place was fine considering the price. If you just need a quiet clean place to sleep at night, then I would recommend this place. Just don't expect anything more.

review.title: Clean, efficient, affordable
review.reviewText: We've come to regard this place as our home away from home when picking up or dropping off folks at SFO. Newly remodeled, clean comfortable rooms, and the hidden gem of San Bruno (with some excellent ethnic restaurants) just a few steps away all recommend it!

review.title: Not impressed
review.reviewText: The location is good but I was not impressed with my stay in the hotel because the room that they provided me is I think not at par compared to other motel/hotel in the vicinity. I will not stay in this particular hotel again. I will instead stay in Howard Johnson which is in the same location.

review.title: Easy to find
review.reviewText: It was easy to find and a good place to stay after arriving late at the airport.

review.title: A decent hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel has great location if don't mind a little bit of drive to San Francisco. There are good restaurants near the hotel and good shopping malls too. Driving to San Fran was easy and traffic was surprisingly light. The room was large. It's got to be as there was a huge jacuzzi in the room. It took us a little while to get use to having this big thing next to the bed! But the soaking after long days was quite welcomed. The continental breakfast was good and well mainatined. This is one hotel I can't think of too many negative things to say. Congratulations to the hotel staff for a job well-done!

review.title: Great value
review.reviewText: clean, quiet, convenient and inexpensive

review.title: Good value for the price.
review.reviewText: Very large room although the (empty) whirlpool took up some of the overall floor space. Everything in the room worked and seemed to have been updated within the last couple of years. Need to use the telephone at the courtesy hotel pick-up point at SFO to ask for the free shuttle service.

review.title: Clean and Inexpensive
review.reviewText: I needed a place to flop after touring the sights in the area, and didn't want to pay a lot for a resort atmosphere that I wouldn't be around to see anyway. This motel was relatively affordable, especially with free parking. The room was very clean and my family and I were not disturbed. The beds were a little stiff, but I prefer it that way and slept great. There are plenty of local restaurants, the mall is only a few miles down the road, and it has easy access to HWY 101. Good stay.

review.title: impressed
review.reviewText: This motel was well kept etc. comfortable bed. Pleasant courteous manger. I would be glad to recommend itand would happily use it again ashould the need arise.

review.title: Well Appointed for a Business Trip
review.reviewText: Clean, Helpful Staff, Good Breakfast, No parking fees, right off the freeway

review.title: great deal, great location
review.reviewText: great location right on El Camino Real (rt. 82), right off the 380/101 interchange. Surprisingly good free breakfast (coffee you can actually drink, real orange juice).

review.title: Good stop for overnight at airport
review.reviewText: Stayed in between flights, great for overnight, nice breakfast and close to airport.

review.title: Helpful when I screwed up!
review.reviewText: We got there very late - 1am - after a late trip, and it was just a stopping point before I picked up our rental car the next morning. However - I DID leave my laptop on the shuttle that brought me to the hotel, and the front desk staff and the shuttle driver were VERY accomodating to get it back to me. That counts for a lot in my book!

review.title: comfortable bed, good breakfast
review.reviewText: The King size bed was very comfortable and the room was quiet. The self-serve breakfast available in the morning was much appreciated.

review.title: Economical Value
review.reviewText: The hotel was a good value for the money. We stayed one day at this hotel. I didn't ngive it a 5 because my wife had to take a semi-cold shower. The water took almost 15 mins to warm up.

review.title: Excellent Deal
review.reviewText: Not fancy, but clean with nice service and a very good price.

review.title: Would stay again
review.reviewText: The room was nice and clean. Would stay again. The continental breakfast was just that. If you are really hungry you might have to eat elsewhere.

review.title: Close and Inexpensive
review.reviewText: Nice hotel for the price. Small parking, but sufficient. No snack machine and water was sold out of drink vending machine. Overall good value.

review.title: Good Place to Spend the Night
review.reviewText: This is a no frills hotel that is a good place to stay overnight. We toured SF during the day and spent the night here. Staff was helpful with directions and with a shuttle to the airport.

review.title: Super 8
review.reviewText: Service was very friendly and helpful.

review.title: Very Confortable
review.reviewText: The rooms were clean, comfortable, free parking and friendly helpful staff. The Air Conditioner was broke, manager came and change us to a different room. Excellent service Close to San Bruno station; park you car at the free garage and take the train to San Francisco; save gas and parking cost.

review.title: would recommend this hotel.
review.reviewText: Very nice and clean room.Would stay again. Staff was very nice and helpful. We had a handicap room because they were out of regular rooms but it was still very comfortable.Only complaint was that the shower did not drain off correctly so floor got all wet but this was just a minor inconvience.

review.title: Super * @ San Bruno is Good One
review.reviewText: This was my first experience @ Super8 which was very satisfying one. If I get chance I would definitely like to stay there again.

review.title: Better than I expected
review.reviewText: This is a motel with very reasonable price. However, I was impressed with the cleanliness of the room and friendliness of the staff there. I'm very satisfied.

review.title: good for the money
review.reviewText: Convenient and quiet.

review.title: It was OK
review.reviewText: I was only there for one night and I found it sufficient for my needs. It was very close to the airport which was ood, and the breakfast was OK too. If I have another long layover in San Francisco I would stay there.

review.title: the worst hotel
review.reviewText: the worst hotel, the front desk clerk was very rude. the toilet kept running. the sink was clogged. no hot water, dusty room, broken furniture, stinky heater, not enough outlet(only 2 in the room).

review.title: A diamond in the rough
review.reviewText: This is a great hotel for the price. It is located close to the freeway and down the street from several shopping centers. I arrived late and still had no problems checking in.

review.title: Good, Clean, Close to Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: This is a great place to stay when flying into or out of San Francisco. Free airport shuttle is very convenient and preferable to renting a car. Basic, clean hotel room. Shopping/dining available within 1-3 miles. I would stay here again.

review.title: Business hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel is adequate and reasonably priced for business. The owners and staff are friendly. There is a very nice, family owned, Mexican restaurant next door to it. We enjoyed it.

review.title: Good place to sleep
review.reviewText: If you look for a hotel for a comfortable night of sleep and on budget, this one a good one.

review.title: Pleasant Surprise
review.reviewText: We would definitely stay here again. The rooms were clean, comfortable, included fridge, micro, coffee, free parking and friendly helpful staff. Nice local meal options and the rental car return from here was a breeze. Thanks!!

review.title: Good hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel is close to the airport and also near to a BART station (San Bruno). The room was clean, also the breakfast room is very small (only 2 tables).

review.title: Good for late night arrival
review.reviewText: My wife and I got into SFO after midnight and just needed a place to stay for the night. This place was fine for that, though the continental breakfast left something to be desired. For the short time we were there the price was right.

review.title: close to airport
review.reviewText: convinient close to the airport.

review.title: Very good SFO hotel
review.reviewText: Nice little hotel, close to airport, not far from downtown, in good condition. Friendly staff. I would stay there again.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Nice room, clean. Nice to have coffee pot, frig and iron. Service was good. Very close to SFO.

review.title: I would stay there again
review.reviewText: My only complaint is that there was no cold water at the sink, it was turned off below. I turned it on and it started leaky. Made it hard to brush teeth, etc. When we left I told the person at the desk, not sure if he was interested or not.

review.title: Fair price/quality ratio
review.reviewText: Hotel room and staircase was very warm; perhaps isolation is not that good. I heard snoring the man in the other room

review.title: Nice, inexpensive hotel
review.reviewText: We stayed here because it was cheaper than staying downtown and we were here on vacation. It is right down the street from the BART transit system where there is free parking. Driving is crazy in San Francisco so I think this is the way to go anyways. The continental breakfast was pretty skimpy...that would be the only complaint.

review.title: An good place to stay on a budget.
review.reviewText: When I checked into the hotel, it was done in a quick and friendly manner. My room was by the elevator. The room was clean and tidy. I like the fact that the room had a microwave and mini fridge in it. The bathroom was large. It had a jacuzzi type tub. There was no shower curtain. The tv remote's batteries came out easily since the battery compartment case was missing. There is only one ice machine in the hotel. It's on the first floor by the soda vending machine.

review.title: Close to SFO.If you have business in the area of the airport, it is convient and less exspensive.
review.reviewText: Not particularly convient to visitors to San Francisco. If you're going into the City, avoid commute hours.

review.title: nice
review.reviewText: clean ,but lack small things, like slippers, toothbrush

review.title: Great place to stay before a flght out
review.reviewText: Price was right and the rooms were quite and beds were comfortable. Coffee was ready heading out. What more do you want before an early flight of of SF.

review.title: Decent enough for the price
review.reviewText: Breakfast items can be improved.

review.title: Good Location for airport as well as downtown.
review.reviewText: From this hotel, you have a 5 minute drive to SFO. To go downtown San Francisco, take the BART train, it's only 25 min.

review.title: Not impressed
review.reviewText: old and too small, without quality breakfast

review.title: Good Location
review.reviewText: This hotel is located very close to the San Francisco airport, but we did not hear much "airport noise." The location made it easy to see the San Francisco sights since the hotel is close to a BART station which took us straight to the city. The continental breakfast had only a few choices and was a little disappointing. Overall, we were satisfied with the cleanliness of our room and the location of the hotel.

review.title: Unbelievable...
review.reviewText: I saw other reviews through Expedia, and I decided to give this "motel" a try. It's one of the nicest places that I've stayed at, and they had a jacuzzi in my room, although no normal shower. Oh no, I have to take a jacuzzi bath to clean up. Everything was clean, and the bathroom was spacious. They had a small workout room and computer room for internet. I would stay here again.

review.title: Comfortable Stay
review.reviewText: Was in San Fran for a convention. This hotel served its purpose very well. Comfortable place to stay. Clean rooms and hotel. Friendly staff. Breakfast was lacking, as are amenities, but if you jsut need a place to stay, it works well. Not located near much, so renting a car might be a good idea.

review.title: Continental Breakfast I Think Not!!
review.reviewText: The hotel was great except for the continental breakfast, which was one of the reasons I selected the hotel. We stayed four nights and never ate breakfast at the hotel. It consisted of some packaged danish and corn flakes, coffe and milk.

review.title: SFO pit stop
review.reviewText: This hotel is a relatively good inexpensive way to wait for another flight if you have a long lay over. Unfortunately there is no shuttle service so you can expect to add another $15 to the price of your stay.

review.title: not impressed
review.reviewText: it seemed that there were no front desk person available. it really helps alot when you have a refrigerator and microwave in the room. i thank you for having a microwave and refrigerator in the room. we have asked for non smoking room but the room smells like someone is been smoking in the room..

review.title: Good Stay!!
review.reviewText: Good Hotel in San Francisco...recommended if visiting and it's close to S.F. airport...convenient!
